1a1(phal chen): / sangs pal ba mashes bya ba bzhugs s+ho/
1b1(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//
2a1(phal chen): @##// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam po brgya
2a2(phal chen): drug pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa
2a3(phal chen): po de dag lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung bar gyur nas/ de'i rjes la byang chub sems
2b1(phal chen): dpa' 'od tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba/ blta na bdang mi bra ba zhig lha mo sgyu ma'i rum
2b2(phal chen): nas bltam ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba ltar/ sprin
2b3(phal chen): gyi tshogs rum nas glog gi 'phreng ba ltar/ ri chen po'i spos rum nas/ nyi ma shar kha'i
2b4(phal chen): sprin go lta bu/ mun pa stug rum nas sgron me chen po byung ba lta bu ste/ mngon par
3a1(phal chen): @bltams par gyur to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha
3a2(phal chen): mo sgyu mi'i lus las gzugs brnyan ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid dang / rmi lam ltar bstan pa'i chos nyid
3a3(phal chen): dang / sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs rnam par dmigs pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i chos
3a4(phal chen): nyid dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i 'od rnam par dmigs pa'i yongs su bstan pa'i chos nyid
3b1(phal chen): kyis mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan to// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di na
3b2(phal chen): gnas shing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing / khong du
3b3(phal chen): chud par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mo gling bzhi pa bskal pa dang ldan pa 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
3b4(phal chen): sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing / khong du chud par bya bar gnas pa de bzhin du/ stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas thos cad
4a1(phal chen): @gser mdog me tog tu/ mgon po de 'khrungs bdag gis mthong bar 'gyur/ ming du dri med skyed pa'i 'od ces bya/ de'i ma mkhas par bdag gyur/
4a2(phal chen): bstam mthag tu gser mdog dam pa'i mdo/ 'jig rten dbang po bdag gis pang du bzhag/ gang zag dam pa pang du bzhag tshe yang // de'i spyi'u gtsug blta bar mi nus te/
4a3(phal chen): bsam g.yas de la g.yas dang g.yon du yang / bltas shing mthar ba rnyed mthong bar ma gyur to// mtshan rab bzang pos de ni yongs su brgyan// dri med de sku bltan rab sdug ste/
4a4(phal chen): rin chen gzug 'dra ba dag gis mthong gyur na/ dga' ba'i shug drag mtshungs med rnam par 'phel/ de'i yon tan dpag yas sems sems nas/ kho mo'i bsod nams
4a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho dpag med 'phel/ de'i rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho mthong gyur na/ rgya cher byang chub sems kyang sked par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i legs pa rgya mtsho dga' smon nas/ smon lam rgya
4a6(phal chen): mtsho bdag gis rab tu bskyed/ 'byam kla sa zhing rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ ngan song las rnams kun kyang rnam par zlog/ zhing rnams 'byam las kun gyi
4a7(phal chen): bde gshegs rnams// ma byon bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang // sems can sdug pa rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir/ smon lam rgya mtsho kho mo btab par gyur// mgon
4a8(phal chen): po de las bdag gis chos thos nas/ rnam thar dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob// bskal pa zhing rnams bye ba'i rdal rnyed de/ spyad pa sprad de de yang rnam par
4b1(phal chen): sbyangs// de la mngon po ci rnyed byung gyur na// de dag ma lus bdag gis kun kyang mchod// rnam thar rgya mtsho 'di ni spong byed cing // de dag brtan pa kho mos yongs su bzung /
4b2(phal chen): zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul 'phrin rang snyed kyi// stobs bcu mnga' ba ji snyed 'das byung ba// de dag chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung // rnam thar dkyil 'khor 'di
4b3(phal chen): yang rab tu bsgoms// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phran ji snyed pa/ rdul tshe 'byam klas kun las rnam par mthong // rdul phran re re la yang rgya tshe'i zhing // sngan chad rgyal bas
4b4(phal chen): spangs pa rab tu mthong // zhing rnams 'bum klas de dag kun tu yang // 'gon po thug rgyun gcig la bsam yas pa'i// rnam 'phrul yang pa yongs su ston mdzad cing
4b5(phal chen): nog tshal mchog tu 'khrungs gyur bdag gis mthong // rgyal ba la zhing rnams la la ni// byang chub dam par 'tshang tshang rgya thugs dgongs shing // dga' ldan 'jig rten zhugs
4b6(phal chen): pa yang // zhing rnams bye ba bsam gyi mi khyab bo/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings su rnam 'phrul pa// shin tu yangs pa skye ba dag gis mthong // na rung dam pa'i tshogs kyis
4b7(phal chen): dbus bzhugs shing // mgon pos chos rnams ston pa'ang de bzhin mthong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab brnyed kyi// dga' ba'i sems kyis skad cig re re la// mngon par
4b8(phal chen): byung zhing shing rgyal drung du gshegs pa dang // sangs rgyas spyod yul yangs pa ston pa mtho/ zhing gcig rdal la bsam bgyis mi khyab par// yul rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag ston mdzad
5a1(phal chen): pas/ 'gro rgyud sems can sdug bsngal grol mdzad cing // mi gcod rnam par 'tshang rgya bdag gis mthong / rdul bran re re'i rtse la mi zad pa
5a2(phal chen): rang 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing // dbyangs rnams rgya mtsho mi zad sgrogs mdzad pas// chos sprin rgya byin char 'bebs mdzad pa mthong // 'gro rnams kun la rnam
5a3(phal chen): pa du mar yang // skad cig re rer mya ngan 'das ston pa// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab rnyed kyis// sangs rgyas zhing gcig rdul las bdag gis mthong // rdul cig
5a4(phal chen): bltas kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // rgyal ba byung ba ba ji snyed kun kyang mthong // tshe rab kun kyang lus mang khra khrig gis// de dag mchod pa'i don du nye bar phyin/
5a5(phal chen): zhing tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// 'gro rgyud mi zad ci rnyed yod pa yin// 'gro ba kun la sngon du kho mo ni// chos sprin yangs pa'i char yangs rabs tu 'beb
5a6(phal chen): rgyal sras kho mos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi// bskal pa bye ba khwa khrig bsam gyis su// thams cad bstan par kho mo nus
5a7(phal chen): ra skan// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa// bsgral pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad de// byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par
5a8(phal chen): 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di shes par zad na// kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi skad cig re re la bskal pa thams cad mchod zhugs pa'i mngal nas yos su
5b1(phal chen): byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa// chos kyi tshul thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i smon lam gyis bsam pa yo
5b2(phal chen): su bskyed pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba// sems can thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud kyi lam yongs su
5b3(phal chen): bstan pa las gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du// pad me'i nang nas kye ba// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par
5b4(phal chen): bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa// sems can thams cad gdul ba la mngon par mos shing tsher skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa// zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du rnam
5b5(phal chen): par 'phrul pa sprin yongs su ston pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam gyi rgyud du skye ba dang // rigs su gzugs bsnyan 'byung bar gyur pa de dag gis spyod pa shes pa 'am/
5b6(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas 'di na// shAkya'i bu mo go ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub seMs
5b7(phal chen): dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// lum bi na'i nags tshal gyi lham
5b8(phal chen): gzi brjid kyis dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bo phyag 'tshal te// lum bi ni nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzangs pos/
6a1(phal chen): dga' ba'i dpal la/ lan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ lum bi ni'i lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil
6a2(phal chen): 'khor bzangs pos/ 'phrul pa rgya tshol lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / skad cig thams cad rnam par bral bar ma gyur to// rig kyi bu kho mo mi brjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
6a3(phal chen): khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'abyam klas byung ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya tsho rdul shin du phra ba thams
6a4(phal chen): cad yod pa la/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad du/ rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la yongs su 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi mig gis lta zhing khong du chud par byed de/ sangs rgyas
6a5(phal chen): kyi zhing de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa byung rgya mtsho dag kyang / lta zhing khong du chud par byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya
6a6(phal chen): mtsho la chen po de dag la yang lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa/ de bzhin tu/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho
6a7(phal chen): dang / sems can rnam par 'dal ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad la yang / sems kyi skad cig thams cad du lta zhing khong du chud par byed do//
6a8(phal chen): ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'didar / rdal shin du 'phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa la 'jug pas/ byang chub sems
6b1(phal chen): dpa' skye ba ma nor bar mngon du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la zhugs par gyur pa de bzhin tu/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
6b2(phal chen): bye ba khra khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul shin du phra ba 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la yang 'jug ste/
6b3(phal chen): de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho shin du yangs pa la 'jug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rnam par
6b4(phal chen): 'bral pa rnams kyang mngon du gyur par lta'o// de bzhin gshegs par gyur nas mchod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las kyang chos bstan pa nyan to// chos la
6b5(phal chen): yang gnyer ba'i chos kyi nan tan tu byed do// de nas lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyis lha mo gzi brjid kyi 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i
6b6(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di dag gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs
6b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i rnam par bltas te tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rim 'gro skyed cing nga la gang dri ba// de dag bdag las rgyal ba'i sras
6b8(phal chen): nyon cig/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul blta dga' zhi ba ste// rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshul gyis rnam par bstan// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab snyed kyi// sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyi mi
7a1(phal chen): khyab dran// bskal pa'i ming ni snga phyi mnyam zhes bya'o// de la rgyal ba bye ba rgya bcu byung // bskal pa dang por de bzhin gshegs byung ba// dbang phyug
7a2(phal chen): yon tan mi thub rgyal mtshan no/ nag tshal dam pa kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi 'dzam bu gling bye ba phrag brgya thams cad na'ang // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku tshe'i rnam
7a3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa bye ba phrag brgya la lta zhing khong du chud par byed do/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i rdul shin tu 'phra ba'i khong du chud pa'i/ sangs
7a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi khong du chud pa dag tu yang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sems kyi khong du chud par bya ba re res bcom ldan 'das
7a5(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku tshe'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la lta zhing khong du chu de byed do// de'i 'og mi sems kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
7a6(phal chen): da phra ba rnams kyi khong du chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang de dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la lta zhing
7a7(phal chen): khong du chud par byed do// tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i
7a8(phal chen): skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khung du chud par byed kyang rdul shin du phra ba thams cad kyi rdul re re la/ zhing gcig nas gcig rgyud pa'i mtha' brnyed par ma
7b1(phal chen): ngo// zhing thams cad kying zhing re rer/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yang mu rnyed par ma rung ngo // ji ltar kho mo 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i// byang
7b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa dang // rdul shin du
7b3(phal chen): phra ba thams cad la'ang / sems kyi skad cig re re'i sems kyis khong du chud par bya ba re re la byin gyis rlabs rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i skye bo'i rnam
7b4(phal chen): par 'phrul pa thams cad la lta zhing khongs du chung bar byed do// de skad ces sbas pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil
7b5(phal chen): 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa skal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad nga byang
7b6(phal chen): chu bo sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di brnyes nas/ yun ni ji srid cig lags smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi
7b7(phal chen): zhing bye ba'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol de'i yang ba lnga zhig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya ba/
7b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba khwa khrig brgya bcu byung ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug gi yon tan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes
8a1(phal chen): bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgrub/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
8a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyis khams kun nas rin po che zhes bya ba der/ gling bzhi pa dbu ma rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba byung ste/ gling
8a3(phal chen): bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ rgyal po'i gnas ri rab rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i gnas der/ rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi
8a4(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba byung ngo // rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od de la/ btsun mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba mnga'o// rigs kyi bu dper na gling bzhi pa bskal pa
8a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa 'di 'dzam bu gling du/ lha mo sgyu ma bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad kyi yum du gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gling bzhi pa rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'dzam bu gling
8a6(phal chen): du yang rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi yul du gyur te/
8a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba khwa khrig phrag brgya bcu'i bskal pa'i dang po la byung ste/ 'og mar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gyi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal
8a8(phal chen): mtshan gyi yul du gyur to// rigs kyi bu lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'od dbang sgyur ba de/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i dus la bangs pa dang / bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan
8b1(phal chen): cig tu/ bza' shing ra ba chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi me tog ces bya ba der phyin te/ dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu de yang / byang chub
8b2(phal chen): sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas der bltam mo/ de'i tshe bza' shing gir ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/ gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de'i dbus su/
8b3(phal chen): pho brang brtsegs pa'i rin po che sna tshog bzang po las brtsegs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ pho brang brtsegs pa de'i nang du shing 'dod pa thams cad 'byin pa'i yal ga la 'jus ste/ lha mo rab
8b4(phal chen): tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyugs gis/ yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan bltam mo/ de'i tshe bcom ldan
8b5(phal chen): 'das de lta ma khar/ ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od ces bya ba ta gon du gnas gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bltam par gyur ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis/
8b6(phal chen): spos dri shin du zhim pa'i spos chu'i bum pa me tog dri zhim zhing yid de 'ong ba sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bskug sil te/ de la tshul dang 'thun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab la/
8b7(phal chen): grangs med mchog tu dbyas pas mchod nas/ mi ma dri ma med pa skyid pa'i 'od kyis pang du bzhag go/ ma ma des byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs ma thag tu/ de'i modo la ma
8b8(phal chen): ma de dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs chen po thob par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yul kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// de thob par gyur ma thag tu/ des phyogs
9a1(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
9a2(phal chen): par bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di la'ang / shin du phra ba'i tshul gyis zhugs par gyur te/
9a3(phal chen): de ni dper na ma'i mngal du bzhugs ma thag tu rnam par shes pa lta bu'o// rnam par thar pa de thob par gyur pas kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa
9a4(phal chen): yang dag par lta ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs so// rigs kyi bu de la ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od/ ces
9a5(phal chen): bya ba byung bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni// khyed kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma ma dri ma med pa skyed pa'i 'od
9a6(phal chen): ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bud med khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung bar gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na
9a7(phal chen): yang / de ltar mi lta ste/ lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu bo/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal na gnas pa kho mo'i 'khor du gyur pa 'di dag yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci snyam du
9a8(phal chen): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug gi yon tan gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gzhon nu'i yum/ rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba byung ba de/ gzhan zhig
9b1(phal chen): yin pa tsam du sems na'ang de ltar mi k+ta ste/ lA lo sgyu ma 'di ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi bu de la ci snyam du
9b2(phal chen): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya bar byung ba de/ gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na yang de ltar mi blta ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang
9b3(phal chen): ma 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po rin po che'i 'ojo 'phro ba'i mig gi 'od ces bya bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo na/ de phyin chad du bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad kyi byang chub
9b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la lta zhing khong du chud par byed pa dang / sems rnam par 'dul ba'i khyu mchog gi mthus rnam par dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //
9b5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ste/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas
9b6(phal chen): ga na ba der phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu
9b7(phal chen): ston pa de nyid bsgom pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rgya cher bya ba dang / nan te bya ba dang / shin du sbyang ba dang / yongs su bsam pa dang / rnam par dbye bar byed cing /
9b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od gang na bder song ngo // der 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i 'ang
10a1(phal chen): @pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba/ khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas bsus nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang la 'di
10a2(phal chen): skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po shes rab dang ye shes chen pos rnam par gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa bsgom pa la lhag par
10a3(phal chen): dmigs pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang ldan pa/ chos yang ba'i gzhal med kyi spyod yul gyi spyod pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du mngon par gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i
10a4(phal chen): thabs kyis tshul mtha' yas pa/ sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par
10a5(phal chen): 'dul ba la rab tu snang ba'i spobs pa dang / ye shes mngon du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa ye shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i spyod pa la
10a6(phal chen): mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
10a7(phal chen): ba thams cad kyis chos khong du chud par bya ba'i lam du zhugs pa byon pa legs so// mig phyir len pas spyod pa dang / spyod lam zab cing rnam par dag pa'i spyod lam
10a8(phal chen): can khyod la bltas na/ khyod ni ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ bla na med par rab tu thob ste/
10b1(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab tu rgyan pa'i lus dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi snang bas brgyan pa'i sems kyis snang bas brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten du rnam par
10b2(phal chen): spyod par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis brtson 'grus dang rnam par gnon pa la bltas na/ khyod ring po ma thogs par dus gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa mthong
10b3(phal chen): ba dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
10b4(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos zhi ba dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang gi dga' ba myong ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par thar pa zab mo chud par gyur to// de'ang de ltar khyod dge
10b5(phal chen): ba'i bshes bsnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / blta ba dang / bsnyen bskur ba dang / gdam ngag ma nor bar blangs pa dang / de'i yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul la brtson par byed
10b6(phal chen): pas yongs su mi skye phyir mi ldog/ sgying mi lug par mi 'gyur te/ khyod la bgogs sam/ bar du gcod pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs te/ bdud dam
10b7(phal chen): bdud kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun na gnas pa med pas de'i phyir khyod ni ring por mi thogs par/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed par 'gyur
10b8(phal chen): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces sbas so//
11a1(phal chen): mo khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de ltar 'gyur ro// lha mo kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rnam par zhi bas dga' bar gyur te/
11a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis las nyams nga ba'i rnam par smin pa phyir log pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med
11a3(phal chen): pa'i las la nan tan du byed pas dga' ba nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro// nams sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnams pa sna tshogs mi bde ba'i sbyor bas/ sems rnam
11a4(phal chen): par 'khrugs shing / ngan song du ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ bde ba'i rgyud na gnas kyang / lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur cing
11a5(phal chen): mi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang shin tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro// lha mo 'di lta ste dper na/ mi shin tu ngang gis byam pa zhig la bu gcig
11a6(phal chen): ba sdug cing yid du yong pa zhig bdog par gyur la/ de'i yan chad dang nying lag gcad pa mthong na/ shin du rang gis byams pa'i phyir// rab tu yi mi bde zhing mi dga' bar
11a7(phal chen): 'gyur ro// lA mi bde bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnam las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du
11a8(phal chen): ltung ba zhig mthong na/ rab tu yid mi dga' la shin tu nyams mi bde b.ro 'gyur ro/ gang gi tshe sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyis leg par spyad pa/ yang dag par
11b1(phal chen): len pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/ bde ba'i rgyus mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur lham/ lha dang mi'i lam gyi rgyud lus dang sems kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyur na/
11b2(phal chen): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing nyams bde ba dang / yi dga' ba dang rab tu spro ba dang / dga' bo'i yid nyams su bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha mo byang
11b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / bdag gis don gyi phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba sna tshogs nyams su
11b4(phal chen): myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa 'di dga' ba rnam par tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer bas ma yin/ 'du shes dang sems dang / lta ba byin
11b5(phal chen): ci log tu gyur pa'i dbang gis ma yin/ kun tu spong ba dang 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang kun nas 'khor ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma yin/ srid pa dang lta ba'i dbang du gyur
11b6(phal chen): bas ma yin/ sems can sna tshogs dang 'di zhing 'jig pa'i dga' ba'i 'du shes kyis/ sems rnam par 'phel ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde ba
11b7(phal chen): myangs pa la yongs su chags pas ma yin/ sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'khor ba'i rgyud na 'gro ldog pa ma yin/ lha mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sem
11b8(phal chen): can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshon 'khor zhing sdug bsngal dpag tu med pas shin tu mnar ba rnams la/ snying rje chen po skyes cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdus pa'i smon lam
12a1(phal chen): chen mo mngon par bsgrubs te/ de dag ni snying rje chen pos smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs kyis/ sems can yongs su smin par byed
12a2(phal chen): ba dang / 'dul ba la brtson zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ngo // de dag ni sems can thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i don du thams cad mkhyen pa'i
12a3(phal chen): ye shes sgrib pa med pa yongs su tshol zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs po/ de bzhin gsheg
12a4(phal chen): pa mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spong pas yongs su skyo ba med de/ de dag kyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kun nas
12a5(phal chen): nyon mos pa'i zhing ma mthong na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dga' bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub bo/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing yongs su spong zhing /
12a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi skye mchod sna tshogs mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ chos sku tha dad pa med cing / bla na med pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par bsgrub po//
12a7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa mthong na/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang / sems rgyun yongs su dag par bya
12a8(phal chen): ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par bsgrubs po/ sems can skye mched mtshangs pa dang sems yongs su ma dag pa mthong na/ sems can thams cad kyis sems dang spyod pa yongs
12b1(phal chen): su sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas yongs su skye ba med de/ lha mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su skye ba med pa'i sems kyis/ byang chub seMs
12b2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa la spyod do/ de ltar spyod pa ni lha dang mi phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bskyed pas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa yin// byang chub
12b3(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir pha dang mar gyur pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'dzud pasam ma lta bur gyur pa yin/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa
12b4(phal chen): las bsrung po'i phyir/ lhan cig skyes pa'i lha rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba lta bur gyur pa yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgrol ba'i phyir/ mnyan pa chen po lta bur gyur pa yin
12b5(phal chen): bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ skyabs su gyur pa yin/ shin tu gsil ba'i rang bzhin nye bar stobs pas/ gnas su gyur pa
12b6(phal chen): yin/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jugs par byed pas/ mu stegs su gyur pa yin/ chos rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ mgon med par gyur pa yin// sangs
12b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi me tog gi sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas/ me tog du gyur pa yin/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi 'od yangs par rab tu 'gyed pas/
12b8(phal chen): rgyan du gyur pa yin/ kun nas mdzes pas dga' ba dang bde ba dab pa byed pa yin/ kha na ma mtho ba med pa'i las la nan tan du byas pas/ phrad nas lan pa yis/ yan lag dam
13a1(phal chen): pa rnam par thams cad du yongs su tshangs pa'i lus dang ldan pas/ kun tu bzang ba yin/ bldan mi mthun pa med pas gtang mi phra ba'i gzugs
13a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ yin/ ye shes kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir/ 'od ces byed pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa'i phyir/ snang bar byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi bsam pa yongs
13a3(phal chen): su dag par byed pa'i phyir/ gsal bar byed pa yin/ bdud kyi las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ dmag dpon du gyur pa yin/ shes rab kyi 'od gser gyi dra ba rab tu snang bar
13a4(phal chen): 'gyed pa'i phyir/ nyi mar gyur pa yin/ chos kyi nam mkha' la blo'i bla ba 'char bar byed pas bla bar gyur pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dus chos kyi sprin chen pos char 'bebs
13a5(phal chen): pas/ phrin du gyur pa yin te/ lha mo de ltar nan tan du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
13a6(phal chen): yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med pa'i dpal// khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha dzas las kyang 'das pa'i me tog
13a7(phal chen): dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang byug pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi char yid kyi rang bzhin mngon par phab ste/ bab nas bskor cing rjes su 'brang nas byang
13a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' khang par 'gro ba'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// byang chub rdzogs par thugs bskyed cing / sems can kun la thugs
13b1(phal chen): rtse bas/ rgyal ba la ye shes nyi ma'i rnams/ bar dga' zhig na 'jig rten 'byung / bskal pa bye ba mang pos kyang / khyod kyi zhal mthong shin du bka'/ 'jig rten ma rigs
13b2(phal chen): mdongs pa la// khyod kyis ye shes nyi chen yin/ ma shes rab rib sgrib pa'i 'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas// thugs rjes chen po rab bskyed de// khyod ni rang byung
13b3(phal chen): nyid du bzhugs/ khyod ni dgongs pa rnam dag pas/ sangs rgyas byang chub don du brtson/ dge ba shes bsnyen bkur bstan mdzad cing // lus srogs 'phangs pa mdzad
13b4(phal chen): mi mnga'/ khyod ni 'jig rten mi mnga' ba/ 'du 'dzin mi mnga' gnas mi mnga'// 'dren pa ma mchis mi rten pas// dgongs pa thogs med na mkha' bzhin/ byang chub
13b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod mdzad cing / bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od bzangs pas// ye shes sgron ma rab 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten tshad med kun tu 'char/ 'jig rten gnas kyang
13b6(phal chen): 'phangs mi mdzad// 'jig rten chos kyi yongs mi 'gro/ chags pa med par 'jig rten spyod// mkha' la ser bu ji bzhin no// bskal pa'i me mar me bzhin du/ rtag tu
13b7(phal chen): 'dar bas rab tu brtson// me lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub spyad pa sprod par mdzad// seng ge'i bzhin du shin du dpa'// brtson 'grus rnam par gnon pa brtan/
13b8(phal chen): ye shes rnam par gnon dang ldan// gzhan gyis thub pa med par spod // chos dbyings rgya mtsho 'di dag ni// rgya mtsho 'tshul rnams ji snyed pa/ der yang dge gshegs
14a1(phal chen): @bsnyen bkur bas/ dpa' bo khyod ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngan med
14a2(phal chen): pa'i dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la// tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin chos 'dod pa'i don du 'brang bar 'gyur to//
14a3(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od du phyin te/ nang du song nas shAkya'i bu mos go ba mthong bar 'dod de/
14a4(phal chen): kun tu bltas na shAkya'i bu mo go bo byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbus na rtan rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa'
14a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa'i gzugs snyan gyi pad me'i snying po can zhig la/ bud med rgyal po'i rigs su byung bas/ sngon byung chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i
14a6(phal chen): rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam pa/ sngon sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas shin du bsdus nas/ tshig snyan cing 'jam par smras pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don
14a7(phal chen): du byas pas shin du bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrubs pa la don 'thun pas shin du bzung ba/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas bu dang bu ma
14a8(phal chen): yongs su bzungs pa'i ngang tshul bcad pa/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i rang gis khyim thab kyi rjes su 'brang ba yongs su dag par byas pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkha
14b1(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin par byas pa/ stong phrag brgya bcurtsa bzhi'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // bud med stong brag brgyad bcun bzhi sa
14b2(phal chen): de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la
14b3(phal chen): gzhan gyi drung mi 'jog pa/ chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skye ba'i yid dang ldan pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags
14b4(phal chen): ba med pas yongs su dag pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngon du bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang bar du gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba/ chags pa'i lam thams
14b5(phal chen): cad las shin du 'das pas// chos kyi sku la legs par sprul pas rnam par spyod pas/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la mngon par phyogs
14b6(phal chen): bsod nams rgya mtsho dri med pas yongs su byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis shin tu byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i
14b7(phal chen): stobs kyi shugs yang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems rab tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa sha stag go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shAkya'i bu mo go
14b8(phal chen): ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ shAkya'i bu mo gob ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas 'dun du 'dug te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
15a1(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na yongs su
15a2(phal chen): 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mgo ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ring bzhin yang khong du chud la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'ami gnas pa dang /
15a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis chos snang ba yang rab tu thob la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rgyun mi mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang rab tu gnas la de bzhin gshegs
15a4(phal chen): pa'i yul yang yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las kyang yongs su 'das la/ 'jig rten gyi lam rgyud thams cad du yang nye bar spyod pa dang / chos
15a5(phal chen): kyi lus yongs su grub pa yang / gzugs kyi lus kha dog mtha' yas pa'ang mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos kyi sku la yang rab tu gzhol la/
15a6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha dog dang dbyings kyi lus kyang yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis par yang rab tu rtogs la/ ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig tham
15a7(phal chen): cad brjod pas kyang sems can rnams la chos snyan pa dang / sems can thams cad sems can med par yang rab tu shes la/ sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i tshul las
15a8(phal chen): kyang mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par yong khong du chud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i sbyor ba las
15b1(phal chen): kyang phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad la las dang rnam par smin pa ma mchis par yang rtogs la/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sbyor ba las kyang phyir mi ldog pa ma tshal
15b2(phal chen): to// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu mo go bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rig kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i chos nyid
15b3(phal chen): rnam de lta bu dri ba sems pa legs so legs so// dri bar brjod pa de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i smon lem dang / spyod pa la mngon par du gyur pa'i tshig go// rig kyi bu de bas na
15b4(phal chen): legs par nyon la/ shin tu yid la bzung shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi snyan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams pa
15b5(phal chen): 'di bu'i mig 'phrul gyi bzhi'i dpe dang 'dra ba ye shes shes kyi 'od kun du byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i gshes brnyen rlabs po
15b6(phal chen): che la brten pa dang / mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa brlabs po che rnam par dag pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pas rab tu brtan
15b7(phal chen): pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa byung ba'i chos brtan pa/ chen po thob pa rab tu thob pa dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa las mos pa'i sems kyis
15b8(phal chen): gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rab
16a1(phal chen): / tu thob pa dang / rang bzhin gyi snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bcad pa'i sems
16a2(phal chen): kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob ste/ rig kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba rnam par 'di lta bu
16a3(phal chen): mig 'bral gyi gzhi'i dper dang 'dra ba/ 'od kun du byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ rigs kyi bu de la brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'
16a4(phal chen): rnams ni chos de dag thob par gyur nas/ kyang / mi zad pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub cing bsgoms pa dang / shin du rgya che rab bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i gshegs gnyen bsnyen bkur
16a5(phal chen): cing / rnam pa bcus mngon par dga' byed do/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / 'khor ba'i yo byad don du mi gnyer ba dang chos thams cad
16a6(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad las rnam par lta ba dang / srid pa rgya
16a7(phal chen): mtsho thams cad gyen du 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / gnas med pa'i chos na mkha' la mi gnas pa mi rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam sgrib pa med pa dang /
16a8(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med pa du spangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang
16b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing mngon par dga' bar byed do// de nas shAkya bu mo go bas don de nyid yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
16b2(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rlabs chen dri med blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing / dge bshes dam pa bsnyen
16b3(phal chen): brtson g.yo dang sgyu med pa dang / ston pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo med brtson 'grus can/ de dag spyod pa 'jig rten mig 'phrul 'dra ba 'di yin// gang rnams mos brlabs chen
16b4(phal chen): mkha' dang 'dra ba ldan zhing // de'i khong su dus gsum 'jig rten chud pa dang // zhing dang sems can chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa// ye shes 'od byed de dag spyod pa 'di yin no//
16b5(phal chen): gang rnams bsam pa mkha' 'dra mtha' dang dpung med la// kun nas nyon mongs dri mas ma gos rab dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon rten 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag spong
16b6(phal chen): ba mig 'phrul gzhi'i rnam 'dra/ kun mkhyen ye shes rnams yangs tshad med bsam yas dag/ yon tan rgya mtsho yid tsam brnyer brten pa// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho'i lus
16b7(phal chen): ngag snying po ste// 'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra skad tshul kun gyis// chos kyi 'brug gi snyen kyang gang rnams mi ngoms
16b8(phal chen): shing / chos tshul rjes su snyegs pa'i shes rab 'od kyi sgron/ de dag 'gro bar 'od gsal byed pa'i spyod 'di yin/ gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ gzhan
17a1(phal chen): dang gzhan dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems shing / bde gshegs rgya mtsho thams cad lta zhing shes byed pa// sangs rgyas sems ldan de dag spyod
17a2(phal chen): yul 'di yin no// rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam par yang ba'i 'khor mthong shing / de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho mang po dang / smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med tshul 'jug pa/ mig
17a3(phal chen): 'phrul lta bu dge sbyong pa 'di yin no// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin brlabs te/ bye ma'i bskal par spyod byed kun du bzang po'i rnams/ zhing rnams 'jab kAs kun du
17a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan byung gyur pa/ chos 'od byed pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// gang rnams ye shes nyi mi'i snying rjes dkyil 'khor can/ 'gro ba nyams nyes mthong zhing chos kyi 'od
17a5(phal chen): snang ba/ 'gro ba'i mun pa gsal cing brten pa 'char byung ba/ nyi ma lta bu de dag sbyong ba 'di yin no// skye dgu srid pa'i rgyud na 'dre ldog mthong gyur na/ yid gsal 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams
17a6(phal chen): phyir ldog rab gnas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongasu sgrubs byed pa/ spyod pa kun bzangs dam pa'i blo can rab tu spyod/ tshul 'dir brlabs pa de dag mtha' dang dpung med pa'i/
17a7(phal chen): lus rnams bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar nyer bstan no// gzugs brnyan mig yar 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad med pa/ srid pa rgya mtsho dgani 'gro mangs yongs smin te/ byams tshul shin tu
17a8(phal chen): yang bas 'gro mangs rgyas bkang ste// mos pa sna tshogs 'gro la rnam par spyod brtan nas// 'gro bar bsam pa ji bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs shing / brtan par byang chub don du sems can
17b1(phal chen): khrag khrig 'dul shin du rgyas ba can pa'i mdo sangs rgyas pal po che shes byang las/ lam ba rgya rtsa bdunag
17b2(phal chen): de nas shAkya'i bu mo go bas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon kyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
17b3(phal chen): thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho tshul thams cad rnam par lta ba'i yul thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
17b4(phal chen): thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis smras pa/ rig ste bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
17b5(phal chen): 'di la snyoms par zhug nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rjel shin du phra ba snyed mthong zhing / khong du chud do// bskal pa de
17b6(phal chen): ngag gi sems can lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can de dag gi shi pho ba dang / skye ba'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de
17b7(phal chen): dag kyang rab tu shes so// mngon par 'grub pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las mngon du byed pa yongs su sgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / las rnam par smin pa sna chos
17b8(phal chen): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de dag gi las yongs su blangs pa dge ba'ang rab tu shes so// mi dge ba dang 'byung ba dang nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / log par
18a1(phal chen): nges pa dang bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang / bag la nyal ba med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung bar gyur
18a2(phal chen): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su zin pa dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su
18a3(phal chen): 'dul ba dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las/ yongs su blang ba yang rab tu shes so// bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed
18a4(phal chen): bo dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cing byung ba de dag gi mtshan rgya mtsho yang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po skyed
18a5(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho las rab tu shes so// smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrubs yangs rab tu
18a6(phal chen): shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyis drung du gshegs pa rgya mtsho yangs rab tu shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas las mchod cing rim 'gror mdzad pa'i sbyor
18a7(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// sngon byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya mtsho yang rab tu shos/
18a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / gdal ba rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad pa rgya mtsho yang rab
18b1(phal chen): tu shes so// chos kyi khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par 'bral ba yang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu shes so//
18b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag na nyan thos ji snyed cig 'khor pa de
18b3(phal chen): ngag gi 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rab tu shes so// lam bsgom pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes so// ye shes thob par bya ba phun sum
18b4(phal chen): tshogs shing rnam par dag pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab
18b5(phal chen): tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong
18b6(phal chen): du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par spyod pa la rnam par brtse ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ci snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang
18b7(phal chen): rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis sems can ji snyed cig yongs
18b8(phal chen): su smin par byas de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos brtan pa ji snyed cig brjod pa de kyang shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa
19a1(phal chen): la rnam par spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas
19a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi 'dakyil 'khor
19a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho ci snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i de dag gis thog ma dge ba'i rtsa skyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thog ma sems skyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab
19a4(phal chen): tu shes so// smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i rgyan thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par tha dad pa yang rab tu shes
19a5(phal chen): so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyis tshogs rnam par dag par bya ba rnam par tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan du bya ba'i rgyan rnam pa tha dad yang rab
19a6(phal chen): tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnan pa'i tshogs rnams pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i shugs drag po rnam par tha dad pa
19a7(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzems pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems pa'i sa yongs
19a8(phal chen): su gnan pas rnam par rtse bas dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnan pa'i rnam par spyod pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu gnas
19b1(phal chen): bdag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i sa rgyud dag kyang rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang dang
19b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa la yang dag pa gnas par bya ba dag kyang rab tu shes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dag kyang nga
19b3(phal chen): tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems
19b4(phal chen): dba'i yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bgod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i
19b5(phal chen): spong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rtse ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang
19b6(phal chen): rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho
19b7(phal chen): sna tshogs pa thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyi klogs
19b8(phal chen): gi snang ba'i sprin dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thob pa'i tshul dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par
20a1(phal chen): gnon pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnams zhing rgya mtsho rjes su bgrong par byed pa kyang rab tu shes so// chos rgya mtsho'i tshul
20a2(phal chen): la 'jug pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// sems can rgya mtsho mtshan nyid tha dad bdag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa'i tshul thams cad kyis
20a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul dag kyang rab tu shes so// smon lam gyi tshul sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phral bya sna tshogs rnam par tha dad pa dag
20a4(phal chen): kyang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu kho mo ji ltar mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la zhugs te/ khong du
20a5(phal chen): chud pa de bzhin du phyi mi'i mtha' cig nas gcig tu rgyud de rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so/ mi chud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
20a6(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes par de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal
20a7(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar
20a8(phal chen): shes pa de bzhin du mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i jig rten gyi khams gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho
20b1(phal chen): dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul gyi shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyi bskal
20b2(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shis pa bzhin du/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mda' chags su gnas pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa
20b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams
20b4(phal chen): ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gnas pa'i/ gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur mdab chags su gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
20b6(phal chen): khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho rnams ji ltar shes pa bzhin du/ phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtog pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi
20b7(phal chen): khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes/ phyogs kun tu 'od rnams par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
20b8(phal chen): cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du phyogs kun 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab tshigs su gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa dag la
21a1(phal chen): gnas pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// phyogs kun tu
21a2(phal chen): 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur mdab chags su/ gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa dga' la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho
21a3(phal chen): rnam rab tu shes so// de bzhin du/ bzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dir gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa
21a4(phal chen): rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang / 'jig
21a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
21a6(phal chen): grong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyil ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
21a7(phal chen): pad mo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sdong po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rta bag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams med du bya ba rnams kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes
21a8(phal chen): so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyi rgyan pa 'di/ ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcur mtha' yas mu med ba'i/ 'jig
21b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu/
21b2(phal chen): shes so// rjes su dran no// sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do/ sngon yongs su bsgrubs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag la'ang shes shing khong du chud do// bskal
21b3(phal chen): pa mtha' dang / dpung med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul dag kyang
21b4(phal chen): shes shing khong du chud do// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur
21b5(phal chen): mdzad cing gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la chod cing rim 'gror mdzad pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong
21b6(phal chen): du chud do// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chos bstan pa yongs su bzungs pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sngon byang chub sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab
21b7(phal chen): tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ yo byad la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
21b8(phal chen): tan rgya tshol nan tan du mdzad tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
22a1(phal chen): dang brtul shugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ byang chub sems
22a2(phal chen): dpa'i bzod pa bsnyed pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs drag po'i rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// bsam
22a3(phal chen): gtan gyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul
22a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas thams cad du/ sku gzugs bstan yongs su brtan pa mdzad pa'i thabs kyi tshul dag kyang
22a5(phal chen): shes shing khong du chud do// kun du bzang po'i spyod lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad
22a6(phal chen): yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang
22a7(phal chen): shes shing khong du chud do/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes snang bar gyur pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub
22a8(phal chen): yongs su gnan pa mdzad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu brnyes pa'i tshul dag kyang shes
22b1(phal chen): shing khong du mdzud do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs te thugs su chud pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rnam
22b2(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam par rol pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do//
22b3(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du mchud do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya
22b4(phal chen): mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// thogs ma'i smon lam gyis tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'dul ba'i
22b5(phal chen): thabs kyi tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ sems can rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing
22b6(phal chen): khong du chud do// sems can de dag gis sems kyi skad cig re re dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thabs kyi rdul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do// ting nge 'dzin
22b7(phal chen): 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang / shes shing khong du chud do// gzungs kyi sgor rab tu thob pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ spobs pa'i ye shes
22b8(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su gnon pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgya mtsho
23a1(phal chen): dag kyang shes shing khong du rung ngo // spyod pa'i dra ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du drud de/ mthar gyis yos
23a2(phal chen): su bsgrub pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud de/ de dag gi dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par
23a3(phal chen): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dag kyang shes shing khong du chud do/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas
23a4(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings thams cad du byung ba shes shing / khong du chud de/ mngon par bsgrub de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
23a5(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems cad da pa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho dang / ye shes kyi sgyu mi dra ba mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas brgyas par 'gengs
23a6(phal chen): pa/ sgo mtha' yas pa nas shin du brtan par bya ba'i phyi ma'i las mtha' bskal par gnas par 'jug pas bstan par bya ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi
23a7(phal chen): dbyings kyi klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs par byung ba thams cad kyang ma 'dres par shes shing khong du chud do// mngon par bsgrub po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
23a8(phal chen): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul gyi yul ni 'di lta ste/ de'i phyir de la snyoms
23b1(phal chen): bar zhugs na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i tshul rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i tshogs kyang rab tu shes so//
23b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul rnams kyang rab tu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi sa las sna tshogs kyang
23b3(phal chen): rab tu shes so// nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang rab tu shes so// nyan thos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yang rab tu shes so// rang sangs
23b4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa zhi bas rnam par 'phrul pa yang shes shing khong du chud do/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho tshul dag kyang rab tu shes
23b5(phal chen): so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya
23b6(phal chen): mtsho la 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu nor bzangs kyi shAkya'i bu mo go ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa khyod kyis byang chub sem
23b7(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la lta ba'i yul 'di brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu sngon 'das
23b8(phal chen): ba'i dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa 'das pa'i pha rol cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jigs pa byed pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten
24a1(phal chen): gyi khams de'i bskal pa 'gro ba'i mchod zhes bya bar 'gyur to// 'jig 'arten gyi khams de'i dbus su gling ba'i ba bde ba yod zhes bya ba byung
24a2(phal chen): ste/ gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ rgyal po'i gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal zhes bya ba/ grong rdal stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi'i phul du bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po'i
24a3(phal chen): gnas sdong po ri bo'i dpal de la/ grong rdal stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang sa so ras si'i baiDUr+ya sngon po las grub pa gnas pa/ rin po che bdun las byas pa'i rabs
24a4(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ 'ongs spos chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal bas/ ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / me tig bu mda' ri bka'
24a5(phal chen): shing rti'i 'khor lo tsam dang / kha dog dang 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs shing di shin du zhim pas/ kun nas khyab pa bdan gyi yongs su bskor ba// rin po che las byas pa'i stegs
24a6(phal chen): bu'i khri 'phang bdun las/ ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdar gyis kun nas bkris pa/ rin po che sna tshogs bdun gyis shing gi nags kyi 'phreng ba dkrigs pas kun nas bskor
24a7(phal chen): ba/ stang nas gser gyis drab bris pa/ rid te sna tshogs kyis rnam par bye ba'i migs mangs ris mdzes par rnam par bris pa/ sa'i bzhi'i shin tu spa bar gyur ba/
24a8(phal chen): dngos grub can gyi tshogs rnams rgyu ba/ bya banun pa'i khrus sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba bza' shing gi rab brgya phrag stong gis mdzes pas byas pa/ shi
24b1(phal chen): tu skyed cing phun sum tshogs par gnas pa/ skyes pa dang bu med brgya stong rab tu dga' bas gang la/ ser bu bde zhing yid da 'ong bas bskyed do/ me tog gi char mang po rgyun
24b2(phal chen): mi 'chad par rab tu 'brul ba/ sa'i bdag po dam pa brgya phrag stong gis gnas su gyur pa dag ste/ grong rdal chen po de dag gi rin chen shing thams cad dang gi dra ba'i rgyun
24b3(phal chen): log pa rlung gis skyed do// 'ong po mang pos sgra dang mnyam pa'i sgra skad byung ba dag las kyang / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di skad ces byung ngo // gsol cig gnoms shig chos
24b4(phal chen): la spyod cig/ byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/ phyir mi ldogs pa'i sa la mnga' thob par mdzod cig/ khyed rnams bde bar gyur cig ces zer ro// rgyal po'i gnas
24b5(phal chen): sdong po raM bo'i dpal dir/ khams kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa gnyis yod do/ blon po brgya
24b6(phal chen): phrag lnga yod par gyur te/ rgyal po nor bgyi bdag po de la bu lnga brgya yod pa thams cad kyang dpa' bo rtul phod pa/ yan lags dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan
24b7(phal chen): gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po'i mchog shin du rgyas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ rgyal po nor gyi bdag po de'i btsun
24b8(phal chen): mo dam pa ni/ pad mo'i dpal dam par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ bud med stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas gtso mor bya ba'o// de'i bu gzi brjid kyi dbang
25a1(phal chen): bo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang po shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
25a2(phal chen): lus dang ldan pa zhig yod par gyur to// de la mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag yod par gyur to// de'ang 'di ltar rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi
25a3(phal chen): bdag po rkang pa'i mthil shin du gnas pa dang ldad de/ sa chen po la rkang pa'i mthil 'dor na mnyam par 'dor la/ 'deg na mnyam par 'deg ste bzhog na rkang pa'i
25a4(phal chen): mthil kun gyis sa chen po la mnyam par rag gi/ de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsib stong dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ rnam
25a5(phal chen): pa thams cad du shin du tshang pa shin du mdzes pa/ bltar sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to// de'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis kyang shin du rgyas par gyur to// rkang pa'i steng
25a6(phal chen): gi mdog shin du gsal la shin du mdzes te/ me tog dam pa bas kyang lhag par mdog bzangs zhing gsal ba gyur to/ de'i rkang lag gi sor mo dra bar 'brel bar gyur to//
25a7(phal chen): shin du mdzes pas rnam par phye ga/ bug med pas zag pa med pa ni dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gnas srung lta bur gyur to// de'i rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ shin tu
25a8(phal chen): dag la shin du stsal pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed par grub pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i sor po rnams kyang ring shing zlum pa/ tshigs par mnyam zhing
25b1(phal chen): yangs pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag mnyam par sa la 'jog go// mnyam par sa las 'deg go/ de'i rkang pa dang lag pa'i mthil yang tsa ka li 'di bas kyang lhag par
25b2(phal chen): reg na bde bar gyur te/ des skyes pa 'am bud med dam khye'u dang bu mo gang la reg kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad bde ba dang yid dga' ba'i dam pa tshim zhing yid shin du bde
25b3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ de'i byin pa ri dogs e ne ye'i byin pa ltar 'dug par gyur te/ rim gyi gzhol ba dang / shin du mdzes pa dang / leg par grub par gyur pas/ ri dag
25b4(phal chen): kyi rgyal po e ne ya ltar de la lus kyang bsnyag pa'am/ sleb par mi nus te/ 'gro bas ngal zhing dub par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzo brjid kyi dbang po de bdun
25b5(phal chen): shin du mtho ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la shin du mtho ba/ zlub la shin tu legs pa dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / tshigs mi snang ba dang / shin du
25b6(phal chen): yid du 'ongs pa dang / blta na sdug gnyis grub par gyur to/ lag pa la gnyis thal gong gi lhun la gnyis/ ltog pa la cig ste de ltar bdun no// de'imatshan
25b7(phal chen): gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa grub par gyur te/ de'i gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa shin du mi mngon la/ nang du nub cing kun nas yogs par 'dug pa ste/ dper na
25b8(phal chen): glang po ma shes sam/ rta cang shes lta bur 'dug pas/ de gos ma gyon par 'dug kyang / bud med dam skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'am/ rgan pa 'am dar la bab
26a1(phal chen): pa 'am/ bla ma 'am bla mar bya ba rnams kyi mi mthong ste/ gzhan du bdag longs par spyod pa dang / ched du brtan par byas ste/ 'dod
26a2(phal chen): bas spyod pa na ma gtogs so// rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de/ ro spong seng ge ltar 'dug par gyur te/ lus rim pas rgyas la/ re skang shin du yangs shed
26a3(phal chen): rdzogs pas ri dgas kyi rgyal po bas kyang mdzes par/ dbyibs shin du legs pa'i ro snod dang ldan par gyur to// de'i thal gong rgyas shing lus shin du rgyas pa/ lus rnam
26a4(phal chen): zar bye ba/ lus kyi ma thams cad rkyen du 'bab par mnyam pa/ lus la dma' ba med pa lus ma thob med pa/ lus la zhum pa med pa/ lus la dgu pa med pa/
26a5(phal chen): lus la rin po che gtan pa shin tu phyis pas kyang lhag par gsal bar gyur to// de'i mgo shin du zlum zhing sha rgyas la shin tu mdzes par gang ba dang ldan par gyur to//
26a6(phal chen): des mi chen po'i mtshan lag pa shin du ring ba thob par gyur pa des/ lus ma btud de lus drang por 'dug kyang / pus mo lha nga gnyis la nyug cig reg go// des mi chen
26a7(phal chen): po'i mtshan lus che zhing drang b.ra'ang thob par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad du mchog du gyur pa dang ldan la/ lus tshul dang 'dra bar mnyam pa dang / lus rab tu mnyen pa dang /
26a8(phal chen): lus shin du lci ba dang / lus rab tu gsal ba dang / lus shin tu sim par byed pa dang ldan par gyur to// des mi chen po'i mtshan mgul dung lta bu yang thob par
26b1(phal chen): gyur to// mi dma' ba'i mgus dang / de'i mgul gyi 'khor thams cad dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad nartsa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang // shin du
26b2(phal chen): mnyams par gyur te/ kun kyang rab tu tshang bar gyur to// mi chen po'i mtshan seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu yang thob par gyur te/ za 'gram shin du 'khregs pa dang / bzhin
26b3(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rgyas pa dang / bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor shin du legs so shing yongs su dag pa dang / kha'i sgo shin du yangs pa dang ldan par gyur to// mi chen
26b4(phal chen): be'i mtshan so mnyam pa bzhin bcu dang ldan par gyur te/ so ma tshangs pa med la zas shig za na 'ang lan cig bla da pas/ chung ngu na 'bras chad kyi 'bru 'ga' yang ma
26b5(phal chen): zhib par za bar med do// so thags bzang zhing mnyam par rab tu thob ste/ mtshams chu sgo med pa dang / shin du mnyam pa dang / rkyen shin du mdzes pa dang / de kha
26b6(phal chen): zas shig phan yang 'go ba dang / 'chag pa dang zhen pa dang / ljar ljin du gyur pa 'am/ thog par 'gyur ba 'am/ gseb 'gengs par gyur pa med do/ mi chen po'i
26b7(phal chen): mtshan so mnyam par rab tu thob ra bar gyur to// so mnyam shing rnga rngo med pa dang / so lhag med pa dang / so zhum pa med pa dang / so gyes pa med pa dang / so thog drung ma
26b8(phal chen): pa dang / so rdo ba med par 'gyur to// gzhon nu de'i mche ba shin tu dkar bar gyur te/ mche ba'i skyon med pa dang / mche ba shin du gsal ba/ mche ba'i shin du dag pa/
27a1(phal chen): mche ba shin du brtan par gyur to// mi chen po'i mtshan lce shin du yangs pa thob par gyur te/ de'i lce shin du yangs la srab cing mnyen te/
27a2(phal chen): shin du 'jab pa dang / las su rung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / bsgyur na bde ba dang / gdong gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gags pa dang / bden zhing phan par 'gyur ba'i
27a3(phal chen): don dang / yi ge dang ngag dang nges pa'i tshigs thogs pa med par brjod par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu de tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang /
27a4(phal chen): rol me'i sgra dang / klu'i nga ro dang sil snyan gyi dbyangs dang sgra skad dang brjod cing smras pa'i tshig las yid du 'ong ba'i brjod pas/ ngag gi lha mngon par dga' ba skyed pa 'jig
27a5(phal chen): rten thams cad mngon par 'dun par 'gyur ba tshangs pa las kyang / lhag pa'i dbyangs spyi ngag brjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las gud du mi mnga' bar thams
27a6(phal chen): cad kyi yid dang / 'thun par byed pa dang / ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu'i de ni mig dkor 'byes par gyur te/ mig shin tu dang ba dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang /
27a7(phal chen): mig la 'od chags pa dang / mig rnam par gsal ba dang / mig mngon par mdzes pa dang / mig bltan sdug pa dang / mig yid du 'ong ba dang / mig 'jub pa dang sngan
27a8(phal chen): bar gyur to// gzhon nu de ni rje ma lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// mig gi skye mched rin po che padam rag ltar shin du dag pa/ mig gi sprin tshungs pa/ mig gi sprin leg pa/
27a9(phal chen): mig gi sprin ma
27b1(phal chen): tshig gi s+t+wa~M yangs pa/ mig gi sprin shi tu brtan par gyur to// de'i smi lam mtshams su mdzod bu skyes par gyur te/ 'jam pa las su rung ba/ shin tu mnyadapa/ shing
27b2(phal chen): bal ltar reg na bde ba dang / gsal ba 'od yod pa chab rom lta bu/ kha ba'i kha dog lta bu 'dug pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu snang bar dang ldan par
27b3(phal chen): gyur to// de'i ci spyi bo la gtsug tor mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// shin du legs pa dang / kun nas zlum pa dang / dbus su bab pa dang / skra'i rgyan du gyur pa/
27b4(phal chen): rin po che pad po 'dab ma byed pa brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa ltar snang ba'i kun nas cha mnyam par gnas pa/ rin teng gdab du tshad med pas ces pa'i gtsug tu gyur pa/
27b5(phal chen): ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de lpags pa shin tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i lus la rdul lam dri ma 'am/ rdul tam ser ka 'am/ gnyer ma 'am/ ldong ba
27b6(phal chen): 'am/ 'khums pa 'am/ 'phyang ba 'am/ slong bag tu gnas pa med par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pa gyur te/ 'dzam bu chu rlung
27b7(phal chen): gi gser gyi mdog lta bu dang ldan zhing / 'od kun tu 'dos gang ba dang / gser ltar gcig tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par brgyan pa dang /
27b8(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas dri zhim pa'i 'od gser 'byung bas lus kyi brgyan rab rib med cing 'od gsal ba dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de ni ba spu'i bu ga re rer
28a1(phal chen): @byung ba dang ldan par gyur te/ baspu'i zug re re nas spu re re skyes par gyur pa/ be dur ston pa'i kha dog lta bu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa
28a2(phal chen): legs par skyes pa/ mthang la zhu bar 'dug pa/ shin du leg par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i spur yan lag gyen du 'khyil bar gyur te/ phyir
28a3(phal chen): mi ldog pa'i spu dang / mi zlog pa'i spu dang / ma 'dres pa'i spu dang ldan par gyur to// gzhon nu de'i mi chen po'i mtshan skra 'thon thing du 'dug pa thob par gyur te/
28a4(phal chen): de'i ske nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i mdog ltar mthong thing du 'dug pa/ 'jam pa sgrub pa/ legs par 'khril ba dang / drung shin du ran pa dang / 'jam 'jam
28a5(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ ma 'dzings pa/ dbyibs mnyam zhing mthun par gnas pa dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po gzhon nu de shing nya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa'i
28a6(phal chen): mi chen po'i mtshan rab tu thob par gyur te/ kun nas rkyen du rin pa dang / kun du bzang ba dang / kun tu mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur to// de ni 'dun nas ltas nas 'ang
28a7(phal chen): doms mi shes shing ltan yid du 'ong la/ rgyab dang g.yas yon dang 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang 'grengs banyal ba dang smra ba dang mi smra bar 'dug pa la ltas na'ang ngoms
28a8(phal chen): mi shes shing / yid du 'ong la bltan sdug ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcurtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis yongs
28b1(phal chen): su brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi lhan yid du 'ong ba'i bdag med pa/ bstan bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/
28b2(phal chen): blta na sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su 'byung ba de lta bu zhig skyes par gyur to// rig kyi bu de nas lan cig rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid kyi bdag po de/
28b3(phal chen): yab kyi sang nas rgyal po'i gnas sdong bai ri be'i dpal gyi gza' shing gau rab spos kyi mi gu'i rtse las/ 'od kyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba der / sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir/
28b4(phal chen): bu mo stong phrag nyi shu dang lhan cig tu/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi bskal pa bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgyan gyis byung nas/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi
28b5(phal chen): tshogs kyi kun nas dga' bar bya zhing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi shing rta rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo chen po bzhi dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo che'i srog shing sra ba/ tsan/
28b6(phal chen): dar dam pa las bsgrubs pa'i yu ba bzang po dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs kyi shing thags rnam par bkye ba/ rin po che thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi rab
28b7(phal chen): tu mdzes par byas paM/ rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba kun nas yog pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa seng ge'i khri rin po che dam dra ba'i rgyan gyi snying po can dbus su bsham pa/ bu mo lnga
28b8(phal chen): brgya'i rin po che'i srang bu lnga ldi nas yongs su gzung ba/ na mkha' la chags pa med pa'i rlung ltar 'gyogs pa'i lha lcang shes stong la bcas pa la zhon nas/ gdugs chen po'i
29a1(phal chen): @#/ rims kyi gzhol zhing bstan sdug pa/ steng log rin po che'i rgyal po bdun dkar po las byas pa'i 'od dris med pa tshad med pa 'byung ba/
29a2(phal chen): rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba sna tshogs thams cad kyi sba bar smras pa te/ rnam pa thams cad du mdzes par brgyan pa/ yu ba rin po che'i rgyal po bdur sngon po las bsgreng
29a3(phal chen): bas ni bskyab/ srog chags brgya stong mang pos ni yongasu bskor/ rol mo brgya stong mang po lha rdzas kyi dbyangs yid du 'ong ba bstan pa dang ldan pa dag ni rab tu blangs/ me tog gi cha
29a4(phal chen): chen po ni mngon par bab/ lha rdzas kyis spos dri zhim pa'i gdugs spos kyi snad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis ni rab tu gdugs cing 'gro bgyur to// de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ lam
29a5(phal chen): yang rgyud brgyad dang ldan par gyur te/ mthon dman med pa dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa dang / gser rdul dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi khams kyi sa bzhi rab tu
29a6(phal chen): bsgrubs pa dang / gser gyi bye ma bkram dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sil mas chal par bkang ba dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng bas dkrigs
29a7(phal chen): ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha ran bkye ba dang / steng nas rin po che'i dril bu dra bas bres pa dang / rin po che'i gnam sol sna tshogs kyis bkab pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal
29a8(phal chen): mtshan dang ba dan dang / snam bu brgya stong rab tu brgyan pa du ma bsgreng zhing spangs pas/ mdzes par brgyan pa dang / g.yas g.yon nas rin po che'i stegs bus 'phreng ba rna par
29b1(phal chen): bkod pas rnam par brgyan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs bu la la la ni/ slong mo ba'i tshogs la yongs su bstabs pa'i don du rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi yod
29b2(phal chen): su bkang ba bkong / stegs bu la la la ni brgyan 'dod pa'i slong ba rnam pa brgyan pa'i don du/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa yongs su bkod/ stegs bu la la la
29b3(phal chen): ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni su ci 'dod pa de dag la de sbyin pa'i don
29b4(phal chen): du/ kha zas dang btung ba dang bro ba sna tshogs kyi yongs su bkang ba'i snod mang po bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu zhim pa'i ro dang kha dog dang dri dang
29b5(phal chen): ro dang reg yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rnam pa bkod/ stegs bu la la la ni ro bro ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi shing thog sna tshogs thams cad spungs/ stegs
29b6(phal chen): bu la la la ni gos 'dod pa rnams yid bzhin du spyod du gzud pa'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mdog bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
29b7(phal chen): ri mo sna tshogs shin tu sba bar rnam pa phye ba shin du btsun pa la 'os pa/ shin du phra ba/ rab tu 'jam pa/ thag sum btags pa/ bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed yongs su bkod par
