138a2(phal chen): cang shes las dang po pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa lam goms pa la/ smon lam gyi ye shes dang mos pa'i mthu'i khyad par ci bdog pa de lta bu ni byang chub tu sem
138a3(phal chen): ma bskyes pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong slob pa'i 'phong gi rgyus
138a4(phal chen): thams cad ni/ dbang por rkang pa'i stangs la gom pa'i bya ba'i mngon du 'groba'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la slob pas/
138a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la yang dbang por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas pa
138a6(phal chen): sngon du 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang yul thams cad yongasu ston pa'i bya ba thams cad ni/ dang por sdug kyi dngos grub
138a7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa yid la byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongasu ston pa'i sangs rgyas dang
138a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad la 'ang / dang po sems bskyed pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni/ yongasu bsgrub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
138b1(phal chen): na sgyu ma'i sngags dang rigs sngags thams cad ni/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa yin yang / sems bskyed pas sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam pa thams
138b2(phal chen): cad mthun smon to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yang gzugs bskyed la/ bstan du med de chos kyi dbyings thams cad bskyed pa la
138b3(phal chen): dbang sgyur ba tsam gyis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba thams kyang rnam par sgrub po// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ byi la'i mig gis lta brtsa
138b4(phal chen): gyis byi ba thams cad kun tu dbyer ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba tsam gyis/ las dang
138b5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa thams cad dbyer bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan btags na/ rgyan thams cad zil gyi gnon to//
138b6(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan thogs pa yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan zil gyi gnon
138b7(phal chen): to// zil du rlag par byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo khab long gi rgyal po'i khab ci tsam du chung yang lcags sgrogs sra ba thams cad zhi bar byed do//
138b8(phal chen): de bzhin du sems thag pa nas bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams ci tsam du chung yang / lta ba'i rnam pa dang ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sgo thams cad zhi
139a1(phal chen): @bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo ba khab long gi khams ni gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/ lcags phal pa thams cad
139a2(phal chen): 'gyes shing mi gnas la mi 'dra'o// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i khams kyang las sam/ nyon mongs pa'i 'am/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya
139a3(phal chen): kyi rnam par grol ba gang dang gang du byung ba de dang de dag gi/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad kyang dbyer zhing
139a4(phal chen): mi 'khod mi 'da'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu srin gyi tshil gyi zag pa gcig zos pa'i nya pa ni chu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/
139a5(phal chen): chu srin gyis sos btab kyang lus la mi chug so// de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyi cha gcig zos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i las
139a6(phal chen): dang 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'dug kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
139a7(phal chen): mngon du bya ba'i lam gol par ltung bas gnon par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung ba'i skyes bu ni gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad
139a8(phal chen): kyi mi 'chi'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sa
139b1(phal chen): sgra thams cad kyi sar mi 'chi'o// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bsku ba/
139b2(phal chen): grub pa'i skyes bu ni mi'i gnas pa thams cad na rnam par spyod kyang mi kun gyi mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i shes
139b3(phal chen): rab dang smon lam gyi nye bar brtan pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang / bdud thams cad kyi mi mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal
139b4(phal chen): po chen po la brten pa'i skyes bu ni/ skye bo ma rabs thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
139b5(phal chen): ba chos kyi nga rgyal po chen po la brtan pa yang sgrib pa dang bar chad dang ngan song thams cad kyi mi 'jig so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa phug gi khyims gnas na
139b6(phal chen): sa'i bsib thams zad rlan gyi yongasu gang bas ma'i 'jigs pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyud byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon
139b7(phal chen): par brlan pa la'ang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi mes 'jigs pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dpa'o la brtan
139b8(phal chen): pa'i mi ni/ dgra thams cad kyi mi 'jigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dpa'o la brtan pa yang spyod pa ngan
140a1(phal chen): la/ @#pa'i dgra thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa ni/ lham
140a2(phal chen): yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ brtan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
140a3(phal chen): rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa yang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi ro bcud 'thung
140a4(phal chen): pa'i skyes bu ni tshe shin tu ring bar gnaso// nyams chung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgas par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sem
140a5(phal chen): bskyed pa'i ro'i bcud kyi tshogs 'thungs pa yang bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba nas 'khor yang yongasu skye ba med la/ 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so//
140a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sman gyi ro sbyar ro mchogs thams cad du chu ni sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la yang skyon du mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
140a7(phal chen): spyod pa dang smon lam gyi tshogs sbyar ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la yang skyon tu mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na
140a8(phal chen): mi'i don du bya ba thams cad la ni srog gi dbang po sngon du 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba la'ang /
140b1(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu srog gi dbang po dang bral ba dang / las thams cad la mthu med pas pha ma dang gnyen
140b2(phal chen): bshes kyi tshogs kyi kyang nye bar 'tsho bar byar med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang bral ba yang / sangs rgyas
140b3(phal chen): kyi ye shes thob par bya ba la mthu med pas sems can thams cad kyi kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byar med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
140b4(phal chen): sde dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dug thams cad kyis gdug par mi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho chen po yang / las dang
140b5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya su sems bskyed pa'i dug thams cad kyis dag par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
140b6(phal chen): ni skar ma thams cad kyi 'od kyis thub par mi nuso// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
140b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi skar ma thams cad kyi yon tan zag pa med pa'i 'od kyi mi thub po// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal pos bu skyes nas yun ring du ma lon pa dang /
140b8(phal chen): blon po'i mchog tu bya ba nas rgan pa thams cad rigasu rigs dang ldan par skyes dang / dbang gi zil gyis non to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu
141a1(phal chen): palasems bskyed nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su skyes pa/ las dang po pa yang yun ring po nas tshang
141a2(phal chen): par spyad pa spyod pa'i nyan thos nas rgan pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi snying rje chen po'i dbang gis zil gyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ blon
141a3(phal chen): po ci tsam du nas rgan pas kyang / rgyal po gzhon nu ci tsam du chung ba la'ang phyag bya dgos so// rgyal po'i bus kyang blon po rgan po la rim 'gror mi bya bar ma yin no//
141a4(phal chen): de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji tsam du rgan pa la ci tsam du tshangs pa'i spyod pa ring du spyod spyod pa rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po la
141a5(phal chen): gdud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la rim 'gro med par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
141a6(phal chen): rgyal po'i bu thams cad kyis mi dgos par bya ba zhig na'ang rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan na/ rigs kyis btsun pas rgyal po'i blon po dam par bya ba thams cad dang
141a7(phal chen): mi mnyam so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' las dang po las dang nyon mongs pa'i nye bar len pa thams cad kyis non pa yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
141a8(phal chen): sems bskyed pa'i mtshan dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi btsun zhing che ga/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mchog tu phyin pa thams cad dang yang mi mnyam mi/
141b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che yongasu dag pa ni/ mig lam la rab rib kyi skyon yod na yongasu ma dag par snang ngo // de bzhin du thams cad
141b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi yongasu dag par yang sems can dang po'i mig mi shes pa'i rab rib kyi skyon dang ldan pa rnams la yod
141b3(phal chen): su ma dag par snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi'i gzugs sngags dang rtsi thams cad bsdus te byas pas ni reg gam mthong ngam/ 'grogs na
141b4(phal chen): yang sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi smon lam dang ye shes kyi lus dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / shes
141b5(phal chen): rab dang thabs kyi bsngags de rtsi thams cad la bsgrubs pa/ byang chub sems dang ldan pa ni thogs sam mthong ngam 'grogs sam/ rjesu mthong ba'i tshul gyis
141b6(phal chen): kyang / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i snang ba rab tu zhi bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gos ngang pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'dam gyi nye ba thams cad kyis
141b7(phal chen): mi gos so// de bzhin du byang chub kyi gos ngang pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam gyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs
141b8(phal chen): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gi gzugs mgo gzer gyi btab pa ni/ yongs su 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// de bzhin du thams cad
142a1(phal chen): bal#/ mkhyen pa nyid du sngon pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyi spyi bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam gyi btab pa'i yang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba
142a2(phal chen): thams cad la mthu yod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi ye shes las lus su gyur pa yin pas yongasu 'gyes par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
142a3(phal chen): na/ gzer dang mi ldan pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni shing gi yan lag de nyid yin yang dgos pa bya ba'i mthu med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sem
142a4(phal chen): bskyed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mi ldan na/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs de yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa mthu med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na//
142a5(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la rin po che'i a ga ru nag po gling pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yon tan des bdag ma thag te/ rgyal po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i yan lag bzhi'i
142a6(phal chen): dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyang na mkha' la gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa a ga rus bdugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
142a7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang khams gsum pa thams cad las rnam par 'angs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes na mkha'i spyod yul 'dus ma byas pa thams cad
142a8(phal chen): kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni rin po che ma rab kyi 'byung khung nas mi 'byung gi rdo rje'i byung khung ngam// gser gyi 'byung khum
142b1(phal chen): nas 'byung ngo // de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta'ang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma rabs kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas
142b2(phal chen): nas mi skye ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongasu skyob pa'i snying rje chen po'i 'byung khung ngam thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las lhag pa dmigs pa'i gser gyi 'byung
142b3(phal chen): khung chen po nas 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shi gi rigs rtsa ba med pa zhes bya ba yod do// de'i rtsa ba mthar thug pa mi dmigs mod kyi/ shing rnams
142b4(phal chen): la yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma dang / me tog shin tu rgyas pa dra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang snang ngo // de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dge
142b5(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa'ing mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams dang ye shes dang / mngon par
142b6(phal chen): shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa smon lam chen po'i dra bar gyur pa'ang yongasu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni snod ngan pa'i gzhi la 'dag na mdzes
142b7(phal chen): bar mi snang ngo // snod ma rdol ba ma rtogs par snod pa dang bu ga can gyis bzung bar mi nus sam/ de bzhin du byed thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo
142b8(phal chen): rje chen po yang / sems can mos bzhan pa'i snod dam/ ser sna can nam tshul khrims ngan pa can nam/ gnong sems can nam/ le lo can nam/ dran pa 'khrugs
143a1(phal chen): #pa 'am/ shes rab chal pa rnams la mi mdzes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rin po che'i snod ma gtogs par sems
143a2(phal chen): can lhag pa'i sam pa log pa la zhugs pa/ blo mi brtan pa'i snod kyi kyang bzung bar mi nuso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni rin po che thams cad 'brug
143a3(phal chen): so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje yang sangs rgyas kyi tshes rin po che thams cad phug par khong du chud par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di
143a4(phal chen): lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni brag thams shig par 'jom mo// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams kyi brag shig par
143a5(phal chen): 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang thams cad la khyad par du 'phags pa'i gser gyi rgyan zil gyi gnon to// de bzhin du thams cad
143a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log par zhugs pas chags par 'gyur kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi
143a7(phal chen): gser gyi rgyan zil gyi gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa
143a8(phal chen): nyid du sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje rin po che nan tan med pas chags par gyur kyang / 'khor ba'i 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
143b1(phal chen): na rdo rje'i khams ni ci tsam du zhig tu chung yang nor bu dang rdo thams cad gcog pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin du dmigs pa ci tsam du chung ba la zhugs kyang / thams
143b2(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje'i khams ni mi shes pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje rin po che ni
143b3(phal chen): skye bo ma rabs kyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ rdo rje rin po che yang ma rabs bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
143b4(phal chen): rtsa ba ngan ngon can gyi lha dang mi'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che yongasu brtag pa la mi mkhas pa'i skyes bu ni/ rdo rje rin po
143b5(phal chen): che'i yon tan mi shes pas de'i yon tan nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni zhu bar mi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
143b6(phal chen): rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang zhu bar mi nuso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje'i lag cha rnon po ni/ gzhan du ni mthu'o che chen po'i stobs
143b7(phal chen): ltar khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu stobs kyi shugs drag po me togs par/ stob po che chen pos kyang gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
143b8(phal chen): sems skyed pa'i rdo rje'i lag cha chen po yang gzhan du na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyus stobs kyi brtan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad
144a1(phal chen): #'chad med pa'i mthu bo che chen po'i stobs ltar khyad par du 'phags pa/ stobs kyi shugs chen po rab tu thob pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos pa/
144a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi stob po che thams cad kyi kyang yongasu gzung bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshon cha thams cad kyi mi tshugs pa gang du yang rdo rje'i sa mi
144a3(phal chen): tshugs pa med do// kha mi 'bab bo// de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba 'am/ dus gsum gyi bskal par spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'grog
144a4(phal chen): bar gang du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas smon lam dang / ye shes kyi mtshon chas drug pa gang la yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i mtsho
144a5(phal chen): cha chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu skyo ba'i yid med pas ni/ mi bzod pa med do// kha mi 'bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni gzhan du na
144a6(phal chen): rdo rje nyid las gyur pa'i bzhi ma gtogs par sa'i phyogs gang gi kyang gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sman gyi tshogs rdo rje ni/ gzhan du na lhag pa'i bas
144a7(phal chen): bas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje brtan pa'i sa'i bzhi ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thams cad kyi gzung bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
144a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho chen po'i snod rdo rje'i bzhi sra zhing gseb med pas chu gsang du 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje gseb me
144b1(phal chen): pa yongs su bsngos pa'i bzhi can la gnas pa yang / srid par skye ba thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje'i bzhi la brtan pa'i sa chen
144b2(phal chen): po ni 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje sra ba'i bzhi la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam
144b3(phal chen): kyang khams gsum thams cad du 'jigs par mi 'gyur dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni chus bangs pa'am rul par mi 'gyur ro// de
144b4(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi chur bskal par gnas kyang rul par mi 'gyur bang bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di
144b5(phal chen): lte ste dper na/ rdo rje ni me thams cad kyi drod kyi kyang tshig par mi 'gyur yongs gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje yang
144b6(phal chen): 'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i drod thams cad kyis mi chug go// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis me'i gdung pas gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di
144b7(phal chen): lha ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying po byang chub la zhugs shing bdud rgol du bzhugs pa mdzad pa dang / tham
144b8(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa rnams bdan ni gzhan du ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i lte'i ba'i sa'i bzhi ma gtog
145a1(phal chen): phal/ #par sa'i phyogs gzhan gyi gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
145a2(phal chen): bdeb pa dang / spyad pa spyod pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa dang / sa thob par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzog
145a3(phal chen): par byed pa dang / lung bstan pa yongasasu gnod pa dang / byang chub sems pa'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad nye bar ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
145a4(phal chen): mchod pa byed pa dang / chos kyi sprin chen po yong su 'dzin pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs dang drag shul de dag kyang / gzhan du na thams mkhyen pa
145a5(phal chen): nyid du sems bskyed pa smon lam thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje srasa'i lte ba can ma gtogs par/ sems can gzhan gyi yongasu gzung bar mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de
145a6(phal chen): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni yon tan de dag dang / gzhan tshad med pa nas yon tan gyi khyad par brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang ldan pa ste/
145a7(phal chen): sems can gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag dang / yon tan gyis chos de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu de
145a8(phal chen): ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ yon tan 'di dag rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol ba ni/
145b1(phal chen): khyod kyis thob par bya ba'i legs par thob bo// rigs kyi bu na re ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ji ltar spyad par bya/ ji ltar nan tan du bya zhes zer ba ni/
145b2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi nang du song ste/ ltos shig dang de ltar khyod kyis/ ji ltar byang chub sems
145b3(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / bslab nas smon tan ji lta bu yongasu grub par 'gyur ba shes par 'gyuraro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
145b4(phal chen): bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa pho brang brtseg pa'i chab sgo dper
145b5(phal chen): gsol// nang du 'chi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyi rgyan pa'i snying po'i sgo drung du phyin
145b6(phal chen): te/ lag pa g.yas pas se gol gtogs stog te sgra phyung ba dang / de'i sgo 'ang rang bye bar gyur pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'dir
145b7(phal chen): song shig/ de nas tshong pon gyi bu nor bzang ngo mtshar chen po thob par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du phyin pa dang / phyin ma thag tu dgo de yang rang
145b8(phal chen): chad par gyur to// des mthong ba khang pa brtsegs pa de shin tu rgya che zhing yangs la/ brgyar dpag tshad brgya stong mang po dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i dbying
146a1(phal chen): rin che grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa/
146a2(phal chen): pa#/ kyi tshad kyi gzhal ga 'khor thams cad du na mkha'i dbyings kar yangs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan gyi rgyan grangs med pas
146a3(phal chen): brgyan pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i brgyan gyi brgyan pa/ mu tig
146a4(phal chen): dmar po'i 'phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyangs pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ seng ge'i mu tig gi 'phreng ba grangs med pa rab tu sbyongs pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ seng ge'i
146a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ zla ba dang zla gam grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ dar gyi lda ldi sna tshog sa grangs med pa'i rab tu sbyangs pa'i
146a6(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar gyi ba dan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa/ rin po che mang po grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba grangs med
146a7(phal chen): pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i snams bu grangs med pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi lcags bod rin po ches spras pa grang med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
146a8(phal chen): dril bu sgra bstan pa 'byung ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha dra ba bskyod na yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra 'byung ba grangs med pa'i brgyan gyis
146a9(phal chen): brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyis me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par spangs pa
146b1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ gam yo nas spos kyi snod nas gdug spos 'thul ba'i yo byad grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser phye ma'i char rab tu 'bab
146b2(phal chen): pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ pu shu'i dra ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ skar khung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rta babs grangs med pa'i
146b3(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i ba gam grangs med pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me long gi kyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i pha gu grangs med pa'i
146b4(phal chen): rgyan brgyan/ rin po che'i brtsigs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i ka ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che'i gyi sprin grangs med pa'i
146b5(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khri 'phang grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i lam grangs med pa'i
146b6(phal chen): rgyan gyis rgyan pa/ rin po che'i grangs med pa'i pad kyis brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ sa gzhi rgyan sna tshogs grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i grang
146b7(phal chen): med pa las brtsigs pa'i khang pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khri grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa/ rin po che'i bu mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
146b8(phal chen): pa/ rin po che'i snam bu grang med pa ting pa'i chags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu glang gi gser gyi chu shing gi ka ba shin rnam par phye ba grang med pa'i
147a1(phal chen): @rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis
147a2(phal chen): brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa grangs med pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i pad mo grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin
147a3(phal chen): po che'i srog shing 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdzing bu grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pun 'da' ri ka grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis
147a4(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rin po che'i them skas grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rnam par bkod pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ sa rin po che sna
147a5(phal chen): tshogs grangs med pas spras pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin du po che chen po'i 'od grang med pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad rnam par
147a6(phal chen): phye ba grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par 'dug par mthong ste/ khang pa brtsegs
147a7(phal chen): pa de'i nang na yang khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan brgya stong 'di lta bu'i rgyan dang lhang lhab gyis rgyan pa/ rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal tshan dang / lha'i ba dan grangs med pa'i
147a8(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa nas/ yon tan dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas gang bar mthong ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad
147b1(phal chen): kyang de ltar ba rgya che ning yangs la de ltar tshad med de/ nam mkha' mdzod du gyur pa/ kun nas shin tu sba bar 'khod pa mthong ba // de khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par phye
147b2(phal chen): ba de dag thams cad kyang / dmigs pa gcig la phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun ma 'dzings pa dang / phan tshun sa la sel por 'dug par gzugs brnyan gyis
147b3(phal chen): tshul du de la snang bar gyur te/ dmigs pa gcig la ci lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la'ang snang bar mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
147b4(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/ khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul du dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
147b5(phal chen): rnams pa de lta bu dag mthong nas/ dga' ba'i shug dpag tu med rnam par 'phel ba'i spro ba dang / mos pa chen po chen pos lus dang sems mngon par brlan pa
147b6(phal chen): dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam par bstsal ba'i yod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang rmongs pa thams cad rnam par bral
147b7(phal chen): ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i phyogs la rab tu gzhol ba dang / sgra thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i dran pas rnam par dmigs pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa dang / yid la
147b8(phal chen): bya ba'i rnam par 'khrugs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / rnam par thar pa grib pa med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i blo dang / dmigs pa thams cad la sgrib
148a1(phal chen): @pa med par mig rab tu 'gro bar gyur nas/ phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad la mngon du ltas pa'i lus kyis phyag bya bar mngon par bsgrubs pa'i
148a2(phal chen): stobs thams cad du khyad par dang ldan pa'i lus thams cad kyi 'ang ste/ phyag byas so// de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi phyag byas ma thag tu/ byang chub
148a3(phal chen): sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du bdag nyid phyin par shes par gyur to// khang pa brtseg pa de
148a4(phal chen): dag thams cad du'ang rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i yul can rnam pa sna tshog/ rnam pa tha dad pa mang po'ang mthong gyur to// khang pa brtsegs
148a5(phal chen): pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thogs mar rigs ni gang du skyes te/ ming ji zhes bya bar gyur pa zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang / yongasu bskul
148a6(phal chen): ba gang dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang gis yang dag par ba dang / tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig du/ bskal pa'i ming ni ci tsam zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs
148a7(phal chen): pa ni gang la/ rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan pa'i zhing du/ 'khor ni ji lta bu zhig tu/ smon lam gyi khyad par ni ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa
148a8(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gyi sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shes par gyur to// khong du chud par gyur/
148b1(phal chen): to/ de'i tshe sems can de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang / mo'i tshad ji srid cig tu gyur pa de tsam gyi dus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
148b2(phal chen): de'i zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par shes par gyur te/ bye ba de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub
148b3(phal chen): sems dpa' byams pas thog ma gang du byam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa dang / dus gang nas bzung ste de'i ming ma byams pa zhes bya bar gyur de dag
148b4(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to/ la lar ni gang du spod pa srad pa dang / la lar ni gang du pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / la la ra ni gang du bzod
148b5(phal chen): pa zhugs pa dang / la lar ni gang du sa non po dang / la lar ni gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan yongasu gzung ba dang / la lar gang du de bzhin gshegs
148b6(phal chen): pa bstan pa yongs su bzung ba dang / la lA ni gang du skye ba'i chos chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / la lar ni gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
148b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / rnam pa ni ji lta bu zhig tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ni sus bstan pa dang / yun ji srid cig gis lung bstan pa de dag thams
148b8(phal chen): cad mthong bar gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i cu'i
149a1(phal chen): las kyi lam la rab tu 'khod ba mthong bar gyur to// la lar ni 'jig rten gyi mgon por gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi phan pa dang bde ba thams cad
149a2(phal chen): kyis/ sems can rnams la nye bar sdud pa dang / la lar ni rgya byin du gyur te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba las sems rnam par bzlog pa dang / la lar ni tshi
149a3(phal chen): par gyur te/ bsam tan dang / tshad med pa'i dga' ba sems can rnams la yongs su brjod pa dang / la lar ni lha'i dbang po rab 'tshe mar gyur te/ tshad med pa'i
149a4(phal chen): yon tan sems can rnams la yongs su brjod pa dang / la lar ni lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i yon
149a5(phal chen): tan brjod pa dang / la lar ni lha'i dbang rab 'phrul dgar gyur te/ lha'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi sprul pa'i rgyan yongasu ston pa dang / la lar ni lha'i
149a6(phal chen): rgyal po dbang sgyur du gyur te/ lha rnams la chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba yang dag par ston pa dang / la lar ni bdud du gyur te/ lha rnams la phun sum tshogs
149a7(phal chen): par thams cad ni rtog par ston pa dang / la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i gnas su skyes te/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor du nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang rlom pa thams cad
149a8(phal chen): rab tu dpangs pa dang / ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi sgyur thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa mthong ngo // khang pa brtsegs
149b1(phal chen): pa la lar ni ge shin rje'i 'jig rten mthong bar te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'od kyis/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad snang bar byed cing / sems
149b2(phal chen): can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo // khang brtsegs pa la lar ni yi dgas kyi gnas mthong bar
149b3(phal chen): gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sems can yi dgas kyi gnas su skyes pa rnams la/ kha zas dang btung ba mang po nye bar bsgrub cing / bkres pa
149b4(phal chen): dang bsgom pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa mthong ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byol song gi skye gnas na skye ba'i skye mched rnams pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis/ byol
149b5(phal chen): song gi skye gnas su gtogs sems can mang po 'bul ba mthong ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni rgyal po chen po'i khams su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor na 'jig
149b6(phal chen): rten gyi mgon po rnams la chos ston par mthong ngo // la lar ni lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyi 'khor na/ la lar ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe ma'i 'khor na/ la lar ni lha'i
149b7(phal chen): rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi 'khor na/ la lar ni rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' 'khor na/ la lA ni rgyal po dbang sgyur 'khor na/ la lar ni bdud kyis 'khor na/ khang
149b8(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i n+ta/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo // la lar ni klu dang lto 'phye che chen po'i 'khor na/
150a1(phal chen): / la lar ni gnod sbyin dang srin po'i 'khor na/ la lar nI dri za dang mi 'am ci'i 'khor na/ la lar ni lha ma yin dang gsod 'phro'i kyi dbang
150a2(phal chen): bo'i 'khor na/ la lar ni na mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i 'khor na/ la lar ni ma'i 'khor na/ khang brtsegs pa la lar ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
150a3(phal chen): lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa'i 'khor na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo // /
150a4(phal chen): la lar ni nyan thos kyi 'khor na/ la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor na/ la lar ni byang chub dpa'i 'khor na/ khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'
150a5(phal chen): sems thog ma bskyed pa las dang po pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chos ston pa mthong ngo // la lar ni spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la/ la lar
150a6(phal chen): ni bzod pa thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i rnams la/ la lar ni tshe gcig gis thogs shing dbang bskur ba rnams la/ khang po brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems
150a7(phal chen): dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa rnams la sa'i khyad par yongasu brjod pa mthong ngo // la lar ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ldan
150a8(phal chen): cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad kyi khyad par yang dag par 'gro bar byed pa mthong ngo // la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu
150b1(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba dang / la lar ni bslab pa thams cad la mngon du 'jug par bya ba kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / la lar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa rgya chen
150b2(phal chen): po dang / la lar ni rnam par thar pa'i tshul zab mo dang / la lar ni bsam tan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms pa dang / mngon par shes pa bzhi pa'i yul gyis rgyas
150b3(phal chen): bar dgang ba dang / la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'dul ba dang / thabs kyi sgo la 'jug pa dang / la lar ni smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rgya chen
150b4(phal chen): po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub semos dpa' byams pa bskal pa 'thun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams dang 'grogs shing / 'jig
150b5(phal chen): rten la phan par bya ba'i don du bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang gtsug lag gi khyad par sems can thams cad ldan pa dang bde bar gyur pa dang / 'byor pa rnams yang
150b6(phal chen): dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo // la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams dang / 'grogs shing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la dbang skur
150b7(phal chen): ba'i sgo yang dag par 'gro ba mthong ngo // khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chags pa med cing / lo brgya stong du mar mi gtong brtson
150b8(phal chen): ba mthong ngo // la lar ni lung dbog pa dang / kha don bya ba la brtson par la lar ni chos kyi sgo rab tu brtan pa la brtson par/ la lar ni dam pa'i chos 'gro ba la
151a1(phal chen): 52/ #brtson pa dang / la lar ni dam pa'i chos bri ba la brtson par/ la lar ni byams pa la mnyam par bzhag par/ la lar ni bsam gtan dang
151a2(phal chen): tshad med pa thams cad la mnyam par gzhag par la lar ni rgyas pa'i skye mched dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad la mnyam par gzhag par/ khang pa brtsegs
151a3(phal chen): pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo //
151a4(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa yod pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i byang chub sems myung po mthong ste/ de dag lus
151a5(phal chen): thams cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa thams cad kyi sprin mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo // la lar ni lus dang ba spa'i sgo thams cad ni lha'i ris kyi sprin
151a6(phal chen): mang po 'byung ba mthong ngo // la lar ni lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci
151a7(phal chen): dang / lho phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang 'tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang / la la'i lus dang
151a8(phal chen): spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni khams kyi rgyal po'i sprin mang po 'byung ba dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni rgyal bu gzhon nu'i sprin mang
151b1(phal chen): po 'byung ba dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni tshong dpon dang / blon po dang / khyim bdag gi sprin mang po// la la'i lus dang baspu'i sgo thams
151b2(phal chen): cad nas ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang po dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
151b3(phal chen): sku'i sprin mang po dang / la la'i lus dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ sems can thams cad du sprul pa'i sprin tshad med pa 'byung ba mthong ngo // la la'i lus
151b4(phal chen): dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas ni/ chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i sgo dang / sbyin
151b5(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang / tshul khrim dang / b+hurtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes pa dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye
151b6(phal chen): shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
151b7(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / bzungs dang / spobs pa dang dang / bde ba dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang /
151b8(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten pa dang chos kyi mdo dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
152a1(phal chen): 2#rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang / nyan thos kyis theg pa'i gtam dang / rang sangs
152a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam dang / sa dang bzod pa dang spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug
152a3(phal chen): pa'i sgra mang po 'byung ba thos so// khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dus par mthong ste/ de bzhin
152a4(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gis rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs skye ba dang / rigs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sku rnam par phye ba tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sku tshe rnam
152a5(phal chen): ba tha dad pa dang / zhing rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bskal pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'byung ba'i sgo rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dam
152a6(phal chen): pa'i chos gnas pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to//
152a7(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi brgyan pa'i snying po de'i dbus su/ khang pa brtsegs pa gcig cig gzhan pas che la yangs zhing /
152a8(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan thams cad kyi rgyan lus pa thams cad ngas kyang ches lhag par 'phags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhig 'dug pa mthong ste// /
152b1(phal chen): khang pa de'i nang na stong gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dug pa mthong ngo // stong gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang // gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag
152b2(phal chen): brgya dang / 'dzam bu gling bye ba phrag brgya dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas bye phrag brgya 'khod pa mthong ngo // 'dzam bu gling de dag thams cad na'ang byang chub sems
152b3(phal chen): dpa' byams pa pad mo'i nang nus skyes pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pas yongasu blangs pa dang / gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / phyogs bcur rnam par
152b4(phal chen): bltas pa dang / seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrogs pa dang / gzhon nu'i sa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / bza'
152b5(phal chen): shing gi ra bar 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon tu phyogs te/ mngon par 'byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' ba'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa
152b6(phal chen): dang zas za ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / bdud rgol du 'jug pa dang / byang chub tu rnam par rgyu ba dang / byad kyi shing la mi ga nas mi 'gebs pas
152b7(phal chen): lta ba dang / tshangs pa chen pos gsol ba btab pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yul sna tshogs yongs su
152b8(phal chen): bstan pa tha dad pa dang / tshul dang ming rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil
153a1(phal chen): #/ 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i tshul bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod
153a2(phal chen): pa dang / slom lam brjod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan ba cing rnam par dgod pa dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs
153a3(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dang / ring srel bsgo ba dang / bstan pa gnas pa'i byin gyis rlabs yongasu bstan pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
153a4(phal chen): zhing lha'i gnas su 'gro ba mthong ste/ de dag thams cad na yang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs nyid rkang pa'i drang na 'dug pa rang gis shes par gyur to// de
153a5(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad yongasasu bstan pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la dran pa nyams pa'i byin gyis brlab
153a6(phal chen): kyis 'du shes rnam pa thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyis gnas pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rol mo dang
153a7(phal chen): sogs pa'i dmigs pa ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug smra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung ba thos par gyur to//
153a8(phal chen): la las ni byang chub kyi sems rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni sa tshad
153b1(phal chen): med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni mngon par shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153b2(phal chen): mchod pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang / la la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
153b3(phal chen): kyi sprin tshad med pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgra gong du ji skad du brjod pa thams cad thos par gyur to// la la las ni thams cad
153b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i sgra thos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ce bya bar byang chub sems dpa' ming dang che ge mo zhig gi chos kyi sgo ni che ge mo zhig
153b5(phal chen): ces bya ba thos// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni che ge mo zhig gis yang dag par bskul/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ge mo zhig gis zhabs kyi drung du bskal pa'i ming ni
153b6(phal chen): 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas kyi ning ni 'di lta bu zhig du/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni 'di lta bu zhig bskyed
153b7(phal chen): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni 'di lta bu zhig thos te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ni 'di lta bu zhig dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa ni 'di 'dra ba nig gi/ byang
153b8(phal chen): chub tu sems skyed nas/ des skal pa ni 'di snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
154a1(phal chen): bapar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ni 'di zhes bya/ sku tshe'i tshad 'di tsam zhig ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis yon tan dang / rgyan du na
154a2(phal chen): sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra ba dang / smon lam gyi khyad par 'di lta bu zhig dang / sems can rnams par 'dul ba 'di 'dra ba zhig dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
154a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'khor kun nas 'dus pa ni 'di 'dra ba zhig go// de yong su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro// /
154a4(phal chen): sems can gyi don ni 'di tsam zhig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so// la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' ming dang
154a5(phal chen): che ge mo zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ btang bar dka' ba 'di lta bu'i yongasu gtong ba rgya ni byed do// byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo zhig ni tshul khrims
154a6(phal chen): srungs // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus bcom mo// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab kyis rnam par dbye ba la brtson no// byang chub sems dpa'
154a7(phal chen): che ge mo zhig ni dam pa'i chos yongasu btsal ba'i don du/ rgyal po'i srid yongs su gtong ba byed do// rin po che yongasu gtong ba dang / bu yongasu gtong ba dang / chung ma
154a8(phal chen): yongasu gtong ba dang / rkang lag dang mig dang mgo yongasu gtong ba dang / mer mchong par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ming dang che ge mo zhig gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs
154b1(phal chen): pa'i bstan pa bzung ste chos smra bar byed do// chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ngo // chos kyi mchod sbyin byed do// cho sgra rgyal mtshan sgreng ngo // cho sta rnga rdung ngo // chos kyi dung 'bud do//
154b2(phal chen): chos kyi char 'bebs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs mchod rten brgyan par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyan
154b3(phal chen): par byed do// sems can la bde ba'i yo byed kyis sdud do// dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod srung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra thos so// la la las ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
154b4(phal chen): ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan che ge mo zhig dbang skur ba/ ming dang che ge mo zhig gis 'khor 'di lta bu zhig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu zhig
154b5(phal chen): dang / skra tshe'i tshad 'di tsam zhig na/ chos bstan pa 'di lta bu zhig na/ sems can gdu ba 'di 'dra ba dang / 'di lta bu'i smon lam gyi mngon par 'tshang rgya bas/ da
154b6(phal chen): ltar bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dril dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad las chos kyi sgo
154b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i sgra thos par gyur to// bla de dag thams cad thos pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' shugs rgya chen pos mngon par brlan pa'i
154b8(phal chen): sems kyis/ chos kyi sgo de dag thos nas/ la lar ni gzungs kyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar ni spobs pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar ni bzod
154b9(phal chen): bskal pa 'di lta bu zhig dang /
155a1(phal chen): pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar ni spyod pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar ni smon lam gyi sgo mang po thob par gyur to//
155a2(phal chen): la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar mngon par shes pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la lar ni pA dang ye shes snang ba'i sgo mang po thob
155a3(phal chen): par gyur to// la lar ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mang po thob par gyur to// la laran ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'jug pa mang po thob par gyur to// me long gi dkyil 'khor de dag
155a4(phal chen): las kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan rnam par dmigs tshad med pa thob par gyur to// la lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil khor gyis gzugs brnyan rnam
155a5(phal chen): par dmig pa mthong ngo // la lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni nyan thos kyi 'khor
155a6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la
155a7(phal chen): lar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam
155a8(phal chen): par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa'i zhing gi
155b1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni chung
155b2(phal chen): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs rnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar
155b3(phal chen): ni phra ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni rgya che ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa
155b4(phal chen): dang / la lar ni mig 'phrul gyis 'jug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni snrel bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
155b5(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs dang / la lar ni spri'u tshugs kyi 'jig rten kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni sa bzhi mnyam par 'jug
155b6(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni sems can dmyal ba dang byol song / yi dgas kyi gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi gzugs
155b7(phal chen): brnyan rnam par dmigs pa dang / la lar ni lha dang mis gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'chag de dge
155b8(phal chen): dang gnas de dag dang / bstan de dag dang la byang chub sems dpa grangs med pa dgos pa sna chog la brtson pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur te/ la lar ni 'chag pa dang /
156a1(phal chen): la ni lta ba dang
156a2(phal chen): bal la la ni bsam gtan byed pa dang / la la ni sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / la lar ni gtsug lag gi tshul sna
156a3(phal chen): tshogs 'jig rten gyi don du 'gyur ba bsgrub pa dang / la lar ni lung nor pa dang / la la kha don byed pa dang / la la ni yi ge 'dri ba dang / la la ni bri ba yongasu 'dri ba
156a4(phal chen): dang / la lar ni phung po gsum pa'i bshegs pa dang yongasu bsngo ba la brtson pa dang / la la ni smon la mngon par bsgrubs pa byed pa mthong ngo // ka ba de dag las
156a5(phal chen): kyang rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od kyi dra ba mang po 'byung bar mthong ste/ la la ni kha dog sngon po dang / la la las ni kha dog ser po dang / la la las ni kha
156a6(phal chen): dog dmar po dang / la la las ni kha dog dkar po dang / la la las shel gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni gser gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni in dra ni la'i kha
156a7(phal chen): dog dang / la la las ni 'ja'i kha dog dang / la la las ni 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog dang / la la las ni 'od thams cad du snang ba'i kha dog lus
156a8(phal chen): dang sems kyi bde ba skyed pa dang / blta na mchog tu mdzes pa mthong bar gyur to/ 'dzam bu chu klung gser chu shing gi ka ba de dag dang / rin po che thams
156a9(phal chen): cad kyi gzugs de dag kyang lag nas me tog gi sprin mngon par mthong ste/ lag nas phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / lag nas gos dang lag nas gdugs pa
156b1(phal chen): lag nas rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lag nas spos dang / gdug spos dang / byug pa dang / lag nas nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang / lag na rin po che sna tshog
156b2(phal chen): dang / gser gyi lcag bod sna tshogs dang / lag nas mu tig sna tshogs kyi se mo do dang / lag nas nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do mngon par sbyong ba
156b3(phal chen): dang / lag nas rgyan thams cad thogs pa mthong ngo / la la ni gtsug gi rin po che dang cod phan gyi 'dud cing mig mi 'gegs par lta ba dang / thal mo sbyor zhing
156b4(phal chen): phyag 'tshal ba mthong ngo // mu tig gi 'phreng ba de dag las kyang spos sna tshogs kyi dri zhim por byas pa'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char gyi rgyun phra mo 'bab
156b5(phal chen): par mthong ngo // rin po che bye dUr+ya'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba de dag las kyang mar me'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba mang po mthong bar gyur to// rin po che'i gdug de dag dang /
156b6(phal chen): rgyan dang lhub lhub thams cad kyis mdzes par brgyan te/ rin po che'i dril dang dril bu ga yer ka'i dra ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po dang / rin po che'i shar
156b7(phal chen): bu dang / nor bu rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi sgo ngas yongasu brgyan pa'i snying po dang ldan pa mthong ngo // rdzing de dag nas kyang rin po che'i me tog pad mo dang / ud
156b8(phal chen): pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka grangs med pa mngon par 'thon par mthong ste/ la la ni mtho gang 'khor ba tsam/ la la ni 'dom gang 'khor ba tsam/
157a1(phal chen): 2/ @la la ni shing rta'i khor lo tsam ste/ de dag las kyang gzugs sna tshogs kyi brgyan mang po 'khod par mthong ste/ 'di ltar bud med kyi
157a2(phal chen): gzugs dang / skyes pa'i gzugs dang / khye'u'i gzugs dang / bu mo'i gzugs dang / brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten mgon
157a3(phal chen): po'i gzugs dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / nyan thos dang rang
157a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi dbyibasu 'dug pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs rnam du ma dang ldan pa mang po
157a5(phal chen): thal mo sbyar te/ lus 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/
157a6(phal chen): dkyil mo dkrungs du bcas te bzhugs pa dag kyang mthong ngo // sa chen po'i gzhi bai DUr+ya las grub pa/ mig mangs ris su 'dug pa'i mig mangs ris re re nas kyang /
157a7(phal chen): gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po mthong bar gyur te/ la la las ni zhing dang gi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa/ la la las ni
157a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa/ la la las ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par mthong bar gyur te/ khang pa brtse ga
157b1(phal chen): kha de dag gi rgyan dang lha ba lbub ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mig mangs ris re re la gzugs brnyan du snang bar mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing rin po che'i me tog
157b2(phal chen): dang / 'bras bu'i mdzod sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad las kyang / lus phyed tsam byung ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa mang po 'thon
157b3(phal chen): par mthong ste/ la la las ni sangs rgyas kyi skra phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni lha dang klu dang /
157b4(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa
157b5(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni 'khor los sgyur ba dang / mi'i dbang po'i lus phyed tsam byung ba dang / la la las ni
157b6(phal chen): rgyal bu gzhon nu dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge bsnyen
157b7(phal chen): dang / dge bsnyen ma'i lus phyed tsam byung ba mthong ste/ la la'i lag nas ni me tog gi 'phreng ba mngon par sbyong ba dang / la la'i lag nas ni rin po che'i 'phreng
157b8(phal chen): ba mthong ba mngon par sbyong ba dang / la la'i lag nas ni rgyan thams cad mngon par thogs pa dang / la la ni lus 'dud cing thal mo sbyar te/ mig mi 'ges
158a1(phal chen): gag#zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang / la la ni mngon par stod pa dang / la la ni mnyam par bzhag pa dang / la la ni gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa dang /
158a2(phal chen): la la ni rdul gyi kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la ni byi ru'i kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la ni rin po che be rduru sngon po'i kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la ni rin po
158a3(phal chen): che'i in dra ni la'i kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la ni nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du
158a4(phal chen): 'dug pa dang / la la ni me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog du 'dug pa dang / la la 'od kyi lus dang / la la ni mtshan gyi rnam par bris pa'i lus su mthong bar gyur to//
158a5(phal chen): zla gam de dag las kyang nyi zla dang bza' skar gyi gzugs brnyan grangs med pa mang po mdong ste/ phyogs bcu snang bar byed pa mthong bar gyur to// khang pa dang gzhal
158a6(phal chen): med khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa'i rtsig ngos de dag thams cad kyang / rin po che thams cad kyi mig mangs ris sna tshogs su bris par mthong ste/ rin po che'i
158a7(phal chen): mang ris de dag thams cad las kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rim pas ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
158a8(phal chen): pa thams cad rim par mthong bar gyur te/ mig mangs ris la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas mgo bo byin pa mthong ngo // la la las ni lag pa
158a9(phal chen): sa ni min phyin par mthong
158b1(phal chen): byin pa mthong ngo // la la las ni gtsug gi rin po che byin pa dang / la la las ni mthor bag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che byin pa dang / la la las ni so byin pa/
158b2(phal chen): dang / la la las ni lce byin pa dang / la la lA ni rna ba byin pa dang / sna byin pa dang / la la las ni snying byin pa dang / la la las ni sha dang rkang byin pa dang / la la las
158b3(phal chen): ni khrag byin pa dang / la la las ni lpags pa dang phri byin pa dang / la la las ni sen mo dang sha dang bcas par byin pa dang / la la las ni dra bar 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i so sor
158b4(phal chen): byin pa dang / la la las ni bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma byin pa dang / la la las ni rin po che'i phung po byin pa dang / la lngas ni grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang khams dang /
158b5(phal chen): rgyal po'i gnas byin pa dang / la la las ni 'dzam bu gling byin pa dang / la la las ni gling bzhi byin pa dang / la la las ni rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug byin pa dang / la la las ni rgyal
158b6(phal chen): bo'i khri byin pa dang / la la las ni bran po mo byin pa dang / la la las ni btsun mo'i 'khor byin pa dang / la la las ni bza' shing gi ra ba byin pa dang / dka' thub kyis nags
158b7(phal chen): tshal byin pa dang / la la las ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan byin pa dang / la la las ni me tog dang 'phreng ba dang byug pa byin pa dang / la la las ni nad kyi rtsi byin pa dang /
158b8(phal chen): la la las ni kha zas dang / skom gyi rnam pa mang po byin pa dang / la la las ni yo byad thams cad byin pa dang / la la las ni gnas thams cad byin pa dang / la la las gzhal ba'i
159a1(phal chen): byabya/ snod rin po ches bkang ba byin pa dang / la la las ni rin po che'i shing rta byin pa dang / la la las ni brtson ra na 'khod pa thar bar byed pa dang /
159a2(phal chen): la la las ni gsad par chad pa las thar bar byed pa dang / la lngas ni byis pa gos pa byed pa dang / la la las ni lam stor ba las ston pa dang / la la las ni mnyan par gyur te/
159a3(phal chen): chu klung gi rgyud la gru 'dor ba dang / la la las ni rta la'i rgyal po stobs kyi sgrol bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i srin po'i gling du phyin par gyur pa'i sems can yongs su skyob pa dang /
159a4(phal chen): la la las ni drang srong chen por gyur te/ bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / la la las ni 'khor los sgyur bar gyur te/ sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
159a5(phal chen): la la las ni smin par gyur te/ na ba'i gsos byed pa dang / la la las ni pha ma phud dud byed pa dang // la la las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim 'gro byed pa dang / la la las ni
159a6(phal chen): nyan thos kyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sems can gdul ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyi sems can gdul ba la brtson pa dang /
159a7(phal chen): la la las ni byang chub sems dpa'i kha dog dang / gzugs kyi sems can gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa dang / la la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog dang / gzugs kyi sems
159a8(phal chen): can bdul ba la brtson pa dang / la la las ni skyes pa rabs kyi khyad par thams cad kyis skye ba yongasu bstan te sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang / la la las ni chos sgra ga
159b1(phal chen): gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa stan la zhugs te/ lung 'bog pa dang / kha thon bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du byed par bya ba la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la
159b2(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas mchod pa la sems can yongasu skul ba dang / spos dang byug pa gsol zhing
159b3(phal chen): 'bru mar dri zhim pos byug pa dang / dril bu dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rnams pa thams cad brtson pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi
159b4(phal chen): lam la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang // bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang / gso sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs 'tshol ba dang /
159b5(phal chen): rab tu 'byung ba dang // chos mnyan pa dang / lung mnon pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba la sems can 'god par byed pa dang / chos kyi gtam bya
159b6(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i bstan la 'dug cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'grel pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
159b7(phal chen): stong grangs med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa de dag thams cad/ tshong dpon gyi bu mor bzangs kyis/ mig mangs ris su de dag las rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan
159b8(phal chen): gyi mthong bar gyur to// des khang pa brtsegs pa la lar ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig bkur ba de dag thams
160a1(phal chen): cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag thams cad kyi drung du bdag nyid
160a2(phal chen): phyin cing / tshur shog nor bzangs legs par 'ongs sam/ mi ngal lam/ 'dire byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang yul rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa
160a3(phal chen): 'di dag la ltos shig ces sgo zhing gtam byed par shes par gyur te/ de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ khang pa rtsegs pa de dag re re dang / dmigs pa
160a4(phal chen): de dag re re las kyang bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / yul rnam par sprul pa 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang grangs med pa mang po mthong bar gyur te/ dran pa'i mthu
160a5(phal chen): nyams pa med pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa phyogs kun tu rnam par lta ba dang / lhag mthong la lta ba'i ye shes sgrub pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang / byin
160a6(phal chen): gyis rlabs kyi dbang rab tu thob pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sa la gnas te/ mtha' yas pa'i rgyan dang / yul rnam par
160a7(phal chen): sprul pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa'i rmi lam du gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i khyad par sna tshogs mang po zhig mthong bar gyur
160a8(phal chen): te/ 'di ltar khyim dang gzhal med khang mdangs dga' ba dang / grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul mdangs dag pa 'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang /
160b1(phal chen): dka' thub kyi nags tshal mdangs dga' ba 'am// shing dang chu klung dang rdzing dang / ri mangs dga' ba 'am/ gos dang zas dang btung ba'i longs spyod nyams su bde ba 'am/
160b2(phal chen): glu dang sil bstan dang rol mo'i sgra snyan pa sna tshogs kyi rtse ba nyam su dga' ba zhig mthong ngam/ pha ma dang / gnyen bshes dang bdag nyid 'grogs par shes par gyur pa 'am/ rgya
160b3(phal chen): mtsho chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dam/ 'dzam bu gling dag na dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar gnas par shes par gyur la// khyim 'am gnas
160b4(phal chen): de'ang shin tu yas shing yon tan dang / rgyan thams cad kyi yongasu brgyan par mthong ste/ nyin par zhig yin par shes kyang nam de yang ring ba dang thung bar bye brag mi 'byed la/
160b5(phal chen): lam yin pa tsam du'ang mi shes so// bdag nyid kyang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ldan zhing lus kyi 'du byed zo mdog bde la snyoms pa dang / gnyid med de mi dga' ba tham
160b6(phal chen): cad yongs su bsal bsal bas dga' ba dang bde ba rgya chen po nyams su myong ste/ yun kyang ring mo zhig lon snyam nas nyin cig gam nyin bdun nam/ zla ba phyed dam zla
160b7(phal chen): ba gcig gam lo cig gam lo rgya 'am/ de bas kyang ring ba zhig lon pa tsam du shes par gyur nas/ sad na de thams cad kyang rjesu dran no// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu
160b8(phal chen): nor bzangs kyi kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / khams gsum thams cad rmi lam lta bur yung dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyis chung ba'i 'du shes
161a1(phal chen): 'gags pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa yangs shing che ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas
161a2(phal chen): shing byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyis yul khong du chud la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul la 'jug pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i blo dang ldan pas rgyan rnam
161a3(phal chen): par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// shes par gyur to// nyam su myong bar gyur to// rnam par dpyod par gyur to// mtshan mar byas par gyur to// dmig
161a4(phal chen): kyis rtag par gyur to// bdag nyid kyang de dag na 'dug par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi nad pa sems kyi rgyud tha ma byung bar gyur te/ de ma thag tu skye ba'i sems nye
161a5(phal chen): bar gnas nas las kyi srid pa mngon du gyur na/ las ji lta bur byas shing bsags pa'i rnam par smin pas/ las mi dge ba'i rkyen gyi ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
161a6(phal chen): song gi skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul 'am/ gshin rje'i mi lag cha gnyems pa thogs pa// gshe zhing khro ba dag kyang mthong bar gyur// sems can dmyal ba'i dud
161a7(phal chen): mo dang / 'odod kyi sgra'ang thos par gyur la// bacha'i chu de dag kyang mthong ste/ spu gri'i so gshibs pa'i ri de dag dang / lcags kyi sha lu ma la'i sdong po de dag dang / ral gri
161a8(phal chen): so'i nags tshal de dag kyang mthong bar gyur tam/ sems can dmyal ba de dag kyang kun nas 'bar zhing yongs su 'bar ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / lcags kyi bum pa gci
161b1(phal chen): tu 'bar bdag kyang mthong bar gyur la/ gnod pa de dag thams thams cad kyis kyang gnod par bya zhing / 'tsho ba de dag kyang nyas su myong ba tsam du shes par gyur te/ sems can/
161b2(phal chen): dmyal ba de dag kyang me'i gdung bas sdug bsngal zhig mthong ngam/ bdag gis myong bar gyur tam/ las dge ba'i tshogs kyi/ lha'i khang pa dang / gnas shig mthong bar
161b3(phal chen): gyur tam/ lha'i 'khor tam/ lha mo'i tshogs dang / rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /
161b4(phal chen): chu glang dang rdzing dang / rin po che'i ri dang / yid bzhin gyi shing dang / longs spyod mang po mthong ngam/ nyam su myong bar gyur te/ che'i yun kyang de dang mnyam par shes par gyur na/ de ni
161b5(phal chen): 'di nas kyang 'phangs pa med pa der yang skyes pa med de/ mi snang bar ma gyur bzhin du/ las kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pas bya ba rnam pa de lta bu dag shes shing mthong la nyamasu
161b6(phal chen): myong bar rung ngo // de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir/ rgyan rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad kyang
161b7(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'byung ba'i gnod kyi non pas ni/ gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mthong ste/ ji dris pa de dag gis lung yang ston to// de bzhin
161b8(phal chen): du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis mthus/ rgyan de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
162a1(phal chen): klu'i khang par byin pas skyes bu klu'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa la zhugs pas/ nyi ma cig gam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla ba byed dam/ zla ba phyed/
162a2(phal chen): dam zla ba gcig gam/ lo gcig gam/ lo brgyar yang 'du shes kyi rnam pas shes te/ klu'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang bral nas/ mi'i 'du shes kyi rnam par na/ yud tsam
162a3(phal chen): las ma lon par mthong ngo // de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pas ma btang ba'i blo dang ldan pas kyang / byang chub sems
162a4(phal chen): dpa' byams pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ yud tsam cig po de yang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong mang por shes par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa chen po'i
162a5(phal chen): gzhal med khang 'gro ba thams cad na rgyan gyi dam pa phul zhes bya ba yod do// de'i nang du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang gzugs bsnyen gyis
162a6(phal chen): tshul du dmigs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres par bsal bar snang ngo // de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi kyang rgyan de dag thams cad dmigs pa thams cad du phan
162a7(phal chen): chun ma 'dzings pa dang / phan tshun ma 'dres par gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na rgyas pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rnam par spyod
162a8(phal chen): ba'i dge slong ni/ gcig pa gnyis su med par khang bu 'am/ 'chag sa 'am/ 'dug pa'i gnas na 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'jig rten thams cad rgyas pa'i
162b1(phal chen): skye mched gang la snyoms par zhugs pa'i yul bzhin du bsam gtan pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas mthong zhing nyams su myong ngo // de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor
162b2(phal chen): bzangs kyis kyang / yul gang la zhugs pa'i tshul bzhin du/ rgyan de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes te/ nyam su myong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ dri za'i grong khyer
162b3(phal chen): rnams kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub thams cad na mkha'i dbyings la byung ba ni yongs su snang yang ci la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na gnod sbyin gyis gzhal me
162b4(phal chen): khang pa na 'dug pa 'am/ mi'i khang pa gnod sbyin gyi khang pa'i khongs na 'dug pa ni phan tshun tha mi dad de/ las kyi yul rnam pa ji ltar dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ngo // 'di lta
162b5(phal chen): ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgya'i gzugs brnyan ltar snang ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
162b6(phal chen): pa ni sngags dang / rtsi'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad kyang yongasu ston to// de bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
162b7(phal chen): kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / ye shes sgyu ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dang byin gyi
162b8(phal chen): rlabs kyi ye shes/ chos thams cad shes pa'i sgyu'i stobs kyi mngon par sgrub pa'i mthusas/ rgyan gyi yul rnams par sprul pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de
163a1(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du song ste/ byin gyi rlabs de dag brtul nas/ tshong dpan
163a2(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs la/ se gol gyi sgra byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin pas longs// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad
163a3(phal chen): ni rnam par bsgrubs na nye bar grub pa'i mtshan nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi byin gyis rlabs pa'o// rang bzhin de lta bu ste yongasu grub pa'o// sgyu ma
163a4(phal chen): dang rmi lam dang // gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs se gol gyi sgra des/ ting nge 'dzin de las lang bar gyur pa dang / de la byang chub
163a5(phal chen): sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ rigs kyis bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
163a6(phal chen): tshogs kyi mthu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rnam par bsgrub pa mthong mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems
163a7(phal chen): dpa'i gnas mdangs dga' ba mthong mod// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bsdu ba mthong mod/ khyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'i sgo mthong
163a8(phal chen): mod/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang rgyan chad med par mthong mod/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa'i khyad par mthong mod// khyod
163b1(phal chen): kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang ba byas mod/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dga' ba dang / bde/
163b2(phal chen): ba myong mod/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis dgongs pa dang / dge ba'i bshe
163b3(phal chen): gnyen gyi mthus mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad la/ shes pa rab tu zhugs
163b4(phal chen): pa'i dran pa nyams pa med pas brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di lta bu/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag ni tshe gcig gi
163b5(phal chen): thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob po// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa brgyan de dag gang du mchis/ smras pa gang nas 'ongs pa de ro// nor bzangs
163b6(phal chen): kyis smras pa/ gang nas mchis pa/ smras pa byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par bsgrubs pa las 'ongs so// de ni byin gyis rlabs de nyid la
163b7(phal chen): gnas shing / gang du yang song ba med la 'phos pa med do// phung por gyur pa med do tshogasu gyur pa med do// brtsegs par gnas pa med do// dngos por gnas par medo//
163b8(phal chen): yul na gnas pa ma yin no// phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ klu'i rnams kyi sprin gyi dra ba ni lus la 'ang mi gnas sems la'ang mi gnas//
164a1(phal chen): 5nang na'ang mi gnas mod kyi/ klu'i sems kyi dbang dang / klu'i dbang bsam gyi mi khyab pas// char gyi rgyun chad med pa bkye ba ni/ med pa yin
164a2(phal chen): te/ snang ngo rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang nang na gnas pa yang ma yin/ phyi rol na gnas pa yang ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang /
164a3(phal chen): khyod kyi snod bzang ba'i phyir mi snang ba yang ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa ni/ sgyu ma'i yul thams cad yongs su bstan kyang / gang nas
164a4(phal chen): kyang 'ongs pa med/ bshig kyang gang du'ang 'gro ba med do// 'pho ba med mod kyi/ sngags dang rtsi'i mthus yongasu mi snang ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyan de
164a5(phal chen): dag kyang gang du yang song ba med/ gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med/ gang du yang phung por gyur pa med mod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes sgyu ma'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa
164a6(phal chen): la shin tu bslabs pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlangs dang / ye shes kyi dbang gis yongs su mi snang ba ma yin no// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags
164a7(phal chen): pa shul ji srid cig nas gshegs/ smras pa rogs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro ba ni 'ong ba med par 'gro'o// g.yo ba dang / gnas pa med pa
164a8(phal chen): 'gra'o// gnas dang brten med par 'grel/ shi ba dang 'pho ba med par 'gro'o// gnas pa dang 'pho ba med par 'gro'o// g.yo ba dang ldang ba med par 'grol
164b1(phal chen): ltos pa dang gnas pa med par 'gro'o// las dang rnam par smin pa med par 'gro'o// mi skye ba dang mi 'gags par 'gro'o// rtag pa med pa dang chad pa med par 'gro'o//
164b2(phal chen): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni 'dul ba'i sems can lta bas// snying rje chen po'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro
164b3(phal chen): ba ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongasu skyob pas/ byams pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/ gang du dga' bar skyes pas tshul khrim so// /
164b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/ sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis smon lam mo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni thams cad du bzhin yongasu
164b5(phal chen): ston pas mngon par shes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas g.yo ba med pas/ mngon
164b6(phal chen): bar 'du bya ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lus dang sems yongasu mi gtong bas/ len pa dang 'dor ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
164b7(phal chen): 'gro ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bas shes rab dang thabaso// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni/ mig g.yor dang gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa
164b8(phal chen): lta bu yin pas sprul pa yongs su ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod lam ji srid cig nas 'ongs zhes khyod kyis smras pa ni/ rigs kyi bu nga ni tshe'i sa yul 'dre
165a1(phal chen): pa stobs kyi grong rdal khang khyim can zhes bya ba de na/ tshong dponas skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag
165a2(phal chen): bas/ che'i sa'i mi rnams la snod kyi tshul bzhin du chos bstan pa byas te/ pha ma dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag gnyen bshes su 'ong ba rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag
165a3(phal chen): par bskul nas 'dir 'ongaso// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi tshe'i sa gang lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang
165a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigasu skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
165a5(phal chen): tshe'i sa'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rigasu skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// sa la gnas pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rigasu
165a6(phal chen): skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni spyod pa'i rigasu skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// snying rje chen
165a7(phal chen): bo ni bsdu ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rig su skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rtogs par bya ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha
