165a8(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i rigasu bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// theg pa chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i rigasu skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
165b1(phal chen): kyi tshe'i sa'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rig su skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// thabs dang she
165b2(phal chen): rab gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i rigasu skyed pas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi nan tan ni 'das pa dang / ma
165b3(phal chen): byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig su skyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
165b4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi tshe'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu thabs mkhas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol
165b5(phal chen): tu phyin pa ni ma'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhab lhub brgyan no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skyed pa'o// bsam gtan
165b6(phal chen): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod pa rnam par dag par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bslab pa la spyod du 'jug pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad ni grogs po'o// dge
165b7(phal chen): ba'i chos thams cad ni gnyen bshes so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni phu nu pa'o// byang chub kyi sems ni rig so// nan tan ni rigs kyi chos so// sa'i gnas
165b8(phal chen): ni rigs kyi gnas so// bzod pa thob pa ni rigasu rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'o// smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni rigs kyi gzhung thob pa'o// spyod pa rnam par dag
166a1(phal chen): @/ pa ni rigs kyi chos kyis rjes snyegs pa'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par bskul ba ni rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa'o// dbang bskur nas
166a2(phal chen): tshe gcig gi thogs pa ni/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sras kyi mthu bo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang dag par bsgrub pa ni rigs kyi rgyud yong su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de
166a3(phal chen): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byis pa tha dad pa'i skye bo'i sa las shin tu 'das pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
166a4(phal chen): su yang dag par byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa yin/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems
166a5(phal chen): dpa'i rigs yongasu bsdu ba la mngon par brtson pa yin/ rigs dang rus kyis yongasu dag pa yin/ mnad kyi rgyud sman du med pa yin/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
166a6(phal chen): bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na/ rigs la smos pa'i skyon thams cad kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te/
166a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam par skyes la/ smon lam chen po'i lus dang ldan pas rigs kyi btsun pa yin no// rigs kyi bu rgyud kyi rigs de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
166a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni/ chos thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur yongs su shes pas/ 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du spang ba med pa yin te/ srid pa'i skye gnas thams/
166b1(phal chen): cad sprul pa lta bur yongasu shes pas// srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye zhing gnas pa thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad bdag med par
166b2(phal chen): khong du chud pas/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas yongasu mi skye'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir/
166b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad la phan gdags pas ngal bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khor ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongasu rtogs pas/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas
166b4(phal chen): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// phung po thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pas/ skye ba dang shi 'pho dang / 'chi ba yong su ston pa thams cad kyis dub par mi 'gyur ro// /
166b5(phal chen): khams dang skye mched chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas/ yul thams cad kyi rma mi 'byung ngo // 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shin tu
166b6(phal chen): bsgom pas/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis myong bar mi 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la rnam par rtse bas/ bdud kyi yul thams cad kyi mi go so// chos
166b7(phal chen): kyi lus byung bas nyon mongs pa thams cad du smos su med do// skye ba la dbang rab tu thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// rigs
166b8(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye gnas kyi khong du chud pa'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs dang mnyam pa'i kha dog gi khyad par dang /
167a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i nges tshig gi bye brag dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ming rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
167a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod lam dang / 'gro ba rnam par gdul ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi rje su 'brang ba dang / sems can
167a3(phal chen): rnam par dag par bya ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshe dang rigasu skye ba yongasu bstan pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad la mnyam pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa'i sgo dang /
167a4(phal chen): sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad mnyam pa'i yongasu shes par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sprul pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
167a5(phal chen): lus yongs su bstan cing brjod pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa'i sems can byang chub kyi stor bar gyur
167a6(phal chen): pa rnams yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dzam bu gling du skyes pa'i tshe yongasu bstan pa dang / lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di'i yul 'phreng ba stobs kyi grong rdal dang / khang khyim dang
167a7(phal chen): ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di'i bram ze'i rig su skyes pa rnams dang / pha ma dang gnyen gshesu 'ong ba rnams rnam par 'dul ba dang / bram ze'i rigs dang rgyud kyi khyad par gyis
167a8(phal chen): rigs kyi nga rgyal can du gyur pa 'di dag nga rgyal med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu skyed pa'i don du 'dir skyes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga lho phyogs kyi
167b1(phal chen): rgyud 'di na/ thabs rnam pa 'di lta bus sems can bsam pa'i tshul ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa ji lta bur 'dul ba rnams yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar
167b2(phal chen): byed cing / khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa'i snying po 'di na 'dug go/ 'di nas nga shi 'phos nas kyang bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du/
167b3(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dga' ldan gyi rigasu gartogs pa'i lha'i bu/ skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba dang /
167b4(phal chen): 'dod pa'i khams nas yongasu 'das pa'i thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang / sprul pa'i rgyan yongasu ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i
167b5(phal chen): dga' ba'i srid pa las rnams par zlog pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du brtan pa dang / lhar skyes pa thams cad mthar rgud par gyur pa yongasu bstan
167b6(phal chen): pa dang / ye shes chen po'i chos kyi sgo 'chi 'pho'i rnam pa zhes bya ba tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang dag par 'gro bar bya ba dang /
167b7(phal chen): lhan cig yongs su smin par gyur pa rnams dang skye bar yongasu bsdu bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bkye ba'i 'dul ba'i pad mo rnams kyang
167b8(phal chen): kha dbye ba'i phyir/ dga' ldan gyi gan su skye ba yongasu ston to// dus la bab pa bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed kyis/
168a1(phal chen): @ngas byang chub thob nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyed dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par bcas pas// da dung yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// song rigs
168a2(phal chen): kyi bu da dung yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa dang / ji ltar kun tu bzang po'i
168a3(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par sgrub pa dang / ji ltar smon par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar rje su 'brang bar bya ba
168a4(phal chen): dang / ji ltar yongasu sbyangs par bya ba dang / ji ltar khong du chud par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la ston pa
168a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu'i smon lam gyis khyad par ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
168a6(phal chen): brgya stong la yang med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa ni tshad med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon
168a7(phal chen): tan gyi khyad par thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa tshad med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi yum lta bu'o// 'jam dpal
168a8(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la gdam ngag ston pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad
168b1(phal chen): yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ming gi 'khor los rnam pa/
168b2(phal chen): rgyas par gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal
168b3(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags shing ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
168b4(phal chen): mthong ba ste/ chos zab mo'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni// rnam par thar pa thams cad kyi tshul thams cad la ring du song ba'i spyod
168b5(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de ni/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu skyed
168b6(phal chen): pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu 'phel bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po rab tu bsgrub pa'o// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
168b7(phal chen): ston pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par bskul ba'o// smon lam chen po'i dra ba thams cad du 'jug pa'o// smon lam sngon par bsgrub pa thams cad la
168b8(phal chen): rab tu gzhog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thob par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad yang
169a1(phal chen): dag par ston pa'o// sngon gyi tshe'i gnas su bskal pa mthun par spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod da ltar yang 'jam dpal gyi rkang
169a2(phal chen): ba'i drung na 'dug gis/ yon tan gyi gdam ngag thams cad thob par bya ba la yongs su skyo bar ma byed cig/ yongs su sgyid lug par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor bzangs khyod
169a3(phal chen): kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji snyed cig mthong ba dang spyod pa'i sgo ji snyed thos pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul ji snyed cig la zhugs pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par ji snyed cig
169a4(phal chen): khong du chud pa de dag thams cad kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabasu bltas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ thams cad la
169a5(phal chen): 'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
169a6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong
169a7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer brgya rtsa bcu kun tu rgyus te/ phyogs kyi gnas yod pa bde ba mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sos
169a8(phal chen): shing rnam par lta bas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthong bar mos shing smon la phrad par dga' bas sdod cing 'dag 'dug pa dang / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
169b1(phal chen): nur gyur pas dpag tshad brgya rtsa bcu'i pha rol nas lag pa rkyang ba ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer yid bde ba mngon du gyur pa na 'dug pa'i spyi bor bzhag ste/
169b2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// dad pa'i dbang po dang mi ldan pa sems skyo ba can/ bsam pa zhum pa dang / sbyor ba bor ba/ brtson 'grus
169b3(phal chen): ldog pa/ yon tan cung zad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la zhon par gnas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la mi mkhas pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
169b4(phal chen): kyis yongasu ma bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ma dgongs pa rnams kyis ni/ chos nyid 'di lta bu yongasu shes par bya ba dang / tshul 'di lta bu dang spyod yul 'di lta bu dang /
169b5(phal chen): gnas 'di lta bu yongasu shes par bya ba rnam par shes par bya ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am yid ches par bya ba 'am// rtag par bya ba
169b6(phal chen): 'am/ rtog par bya ba 'am/ thob par bya ba ni mi nus so zhes te/ des de la chos kyi gtam gyi yang dag par bstan po dang / yang dag par bskul ba dang / bzengs stod
169b7(phal chen): pa dang / dga' bar byas te chos kyi sgo grangs med pa dang ldan par byas nas/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i snang ba chen po thob par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs
169b8(phal chen): dang / spobs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis byin du rlab par byas te/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la
170a1(phal chen): @#bzhag nas/ bdag gi yul la'ang rab tu bzhag ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs drung nas song ngo // / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//
170a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// / sangs rgyas bal po zhes bya ba las sdang
170a3(phal chen): bos brgyan pa// // bam po brgya rtsa bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
170a4(phal chen): gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs sogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdam
170a5(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi drung du bsam pa mnyam pas 'gro ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
170a6(phal chen): thams cad dga' bar bya bas yid mi 'byung ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdam ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/
170a7(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i bsam pa rgya mtsho las yang dag par byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po'i tshul gyi sprin gyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par snang ba'i byed pa/ dga' ba
170a8(phal chen): chen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i lus dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po la rab tu zhi bar rnam par spyod pa/ sgo thams cad nas lhag par 'phro
170b1(phal chen): ba 'am gtong ba'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan rab tu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mos pa'i
170b2(phal chen): lam du zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs la brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pas
170b3(phal chen): shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la zhugs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho khong du chud
170b4(phal chen): ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba/ 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du gzugs brnyan yongasu
170b5(phal chen): ston pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i
170b6(phal chen): spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad rnam par 'phel ba/ thams cad mkhyen
170b7(phal chen): ba'i lam snang ba rab tu thob pa/ phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba rab tu thos pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul
170b8(phal chen): la rab tu zhugs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ zhing gi tshul thams cad la snang ba rab tu grub pa/ sems can 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi
171a1(phal chen): don bya ba largyad dang mi 'thun pa med par rdzas su song ba/ sgrib pa'i g.yang sa'i ri thams cad
171a2(phal chen): rnam par thor pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la sa'i gzhi kun tu gnas pa'i chos kyi
171a3(phal chen): dbyings kyi snying po can la rab tu zhi bar rnam par spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rjes su tshol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
171a4(phal chen): cad kyis byin gyis rlangs pa te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba'i spyod yul la rnams par spyod cing 'dug par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
171a5(phal chen): chen po kun tu bzang po'i ming thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par zos pa
171a6(phal chen): tshogs yongasu bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas pa'i khyad par thos pa dang / mngon par
171a7(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / 'byung ba'i las kyi khyad par thos pa dang / kun tu bzang ba'i sa'i tshul gyi rgyud thos pa dang /
171a8(phal chen): pa'i chags thas pa dang / sa thob par byang ba'i shugs pas pa dang / sa yangs gnan pa'i bas pa dang / sa la gnas pams dang /
171b1(phal chen): sa sngon du 'dang bas rnam par gnan pa thos pa dang / sa'i spyad yul zas pa dang / san byin gyis brlabs thos pa dang / sa la yang
171b2(phal chen): dag par gnas pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar dga' ning snyam ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings
171b3(phal chen): shin tu yangs pa'i sems mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang zhing 'du shes shin tu rnams pa dang / chags pa thams
171b4(phal chen): cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems chos thams cad las sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can dang / thogs pa med pa'i
171b5(phal chen): sems phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul
171b6(phal chen): yongs su gnon pa dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems snying po byang chub kyi rgyan lhag mthong gis yongs su dag pa dang /
171b7(phal chen): shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang // shin tu yangs pa'i
171b8(phal chen): sems sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba
172a1(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / shin tu pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasasu dag par byed pa dang / tshad med pa'i sems sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
172a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas mi zad cing mthar thug pa med pa'i sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stong
172a3(phal chen): dang / mi snyengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mthar thug pas/ snying po byang chub rdo rje dam pa'i snying po can de la/ pad+mo'i stan rin po che thams cad kyi lhan can zhig la/ de bzhin
172a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri la mngon par ltas te 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de lta bu'i bsam pa dang yid la bya ba la brtson par gnas pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rlan
172a5(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlab dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po dang / mngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skal pa mthun pas byang chub sems dpa'
172a6(phal chen): kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur bar sngon gyi ltas bcu byung ngo // bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi
172a7(phal chen): rgyan rnam par dag pas/ rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bsal bas rnam par dag
172a8(phal chen): bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyi rgyan ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems cad kyi lus dang / sems
172b1(phal chen): dga' zhing sems par byed pas/ rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi ring bzhin tu kun tu gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sad
172b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can gyi khams kun mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rab rgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan dang lha
172b3(phal chen): lhab kyi sprin gyis kun tu khyabs par kun nas gni par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sem can gyi khams thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang /
172b4(phal chen): gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snying po byang chub kyi rgyan par kun nas gnas pas rnam par
172b5(phal chen): dag par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rjes dran pa yid la bya ba la brtson par kun nas gnas pas rnam par dag par gyur te/ byang chub
172b6(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur sngon gyi lngas bcu po de dag 'byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
172b7(phal chen): tu bzang po mngon par 'gyur ba'i mngon gyis ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdal shin tu phra ba rnams las/
172b8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba re re zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba mang po rnam par snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba
173a1(phal chen): rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'thon te/ kha dog gcig pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang /
173a2(phal chen): kha dog brgya stong du mar chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang
173a3(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par byed pa mang po 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
173a4(phal chen): par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'khor lo
173a5(phal chen): dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mang mthon te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdal shin tu phra ba rnams las/ rdul
173a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba re re las kyang / spos dang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdug pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i yon chos rgya mtsho'i
173a7(phal chen): sprin thams cad kyi 'brug sgra rab tu sgrog cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rgyas par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rdul shin tu phra ba rnams
173a8(phal chen): las/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ byang chub sems kun tu bzang po'i 'od rab tu 'gyed cing / chos kyi dbyings
173b1(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang lus thams cad kyi dbyings ltar
173b2(phal chen): 'dug pa'i mar ma'i sprin mang po mthon nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ltar rab tu snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi kham
173b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rdal shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang nor bu rin po che'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur snang ba'i sprin mang mang po 'thon
173b4(phal chen): nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re
173b5(phal chen): las kyang / 'od zer gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dbyibasu snang ba'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / smon lam gyi
173b6(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ rdul shin
173b7(phal chen): tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba rnams las rdul shin tu phra ba re re las kyang byang chub seMs dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad
173b8(phal chen): kyi kha dog tu snang ba'i sprin rgya mtsho sems can thams cad gdon pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par sgrub pa mang po 'thon te/
174a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar gyur pa'i sngon gyi lhas snang ba chen po
174a2(phal chen): bcu po de dag byung bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ sngon gyi lta su snang ba bcu po de dag mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong
174a3(phal chen): bar gyur pa'i skabs ni phye/ rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas ni brtan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snang ba ni yang dag par
174a4(phal chen): skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ni mngon tu gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i smon lam gyi ni byin du rlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
174a5(phal chen): cad kyis spyod yul ni mngon par mos/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul rlabs po che la shin tu nges pa'i stobs dang shugs ni rab tu thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po
174a6(phal chen): mthong na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dang / 'dra ba ni sems/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po mthong bar bya ba la dbang po ni sngon tu gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
174a7(phal chen): kun tu bzang po mthong bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po ni thob/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yongasu btsal ba la brtson 'grus kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang
174a8(phal chen): ni ldan/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gyur pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / kun tu lta bas yul yongasu gnon pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i
174b1(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'dug pa'i 'dug pa'i rjesu 'brang ba'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs par bya ba la yang
174b2(phal chen): dag par btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa yongasu btsal ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po
174b3(phal chen): mthong bar bya ba'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lam la zhugs pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings ltar yang
174b4(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rdo rje thogs pa'i lhags pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rjesu 'brang bar smon pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal
174b5(phal chen): ba'i mur thug pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / yongasu gnon pa'i rtsal rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rje su song ba dang
174b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul la yang dag par gnas pa dang ni ldan
174b7(phal chen): pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyis rje su thob pa/ dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su song ba/
174b8(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul can/ mu med pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa rnam par lta ba/
175a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyi zil gyi ma non pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang na mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan
175a2(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgyu snga na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho na ni 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i mchogs ni yongasu bskor/
175a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis ni mdun du byas shing / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can zhig la 'dug pa mthong ste/ des de ba spu'i bu ga thams
175a4(phal chen): cad las ba spu'i sgo re re gnas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer gyi sprin mang po 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi
175a5(phal chen): kA sa pa na mkha'i mtha'i gtugs pa thams cad rab tu snang byis/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar mthong ngo // des de'i lus las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
175a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po kha dog sna tshogs can mang po mthon te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dga' ba dang / bos pa'i
175a7(phal chen): shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'bel bar byed pa mthong ngo // spyi bo dang phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kyang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi char kha dog sna chog
175a8(phal chen): su 'dug pa mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par skang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga
175b1(phal chen): thams cad las sku'i bsgo re re nas kyang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed mang po mngon par 'thon nas de bzhin
175b2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang / spos sna tshogs kyi
175b3(phal chen): shing gi sprin mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyis rdal shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad rgyas par
175b4(phal chen): bkang nas/ spos kyi shing gi sprin gyi rgyan gyi brgyan par byas te/ spos dang phye ma dang / gdug pa'i mdzod zad mi shes pa'i char rab tu 'gyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
175b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par skang ste/ mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / gos sna tshogs kyi sprin mang
175b6(phal chen): po mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa thams cad kun nas g.yogs par byas nas rgyan par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las baspu'i
175b7(phal chen): sgo re re nas kyang dar sna tshogs kyi lda ldi'i sprin dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi sprin gyi char sangs rgyas
175b8(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdal shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bkang ste/ mngon par 'bab par mthong
176a1(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par sgrub pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i shing gi sprin
176a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ chos kyi dbying na mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ rin po che'i shing sa la
176a3(phal chen): rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu/ rin po che'i char chen po mngon par 'bab
176a4(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas gzugs kyi khams kyi lci ris kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin
176a5(phal chen): du phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par bsngags par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par mthong ngo // bra spu'i
176a6(phal chen): bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang tshangs pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i ris thams cad du sprul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par sangs rgyas bri
176a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bug thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'dod pa'i khams tham
176a8(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po yang dag par 'dzin to// khar ma
176b1(phal chen): ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sprin/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
176b2(phal chen): 'dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon nas/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can
176b3(phal chen): gnas med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi gnas me dang / skyabs dang rten du gyur par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sem
176b4(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu gang ba'i sprin/ sang
176b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi nA mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can mos
176b6(phal chen): pa mos rlabs po che rnams yongasu dag par bsgrub par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mong
176b7(phal chen): ga/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad rgyas par
176b8(phal chen): bkang ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgrub pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga re re'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las/ sems kyi skad cig re re las
177a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sprin mang po mngon par
177a2(phal chen): 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyi klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par dag par bsgrub par
177a3(phal chen): mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra snyed mngon par
177a4(phal chen): 'thon te/ sems can gyi khams na mkha'i dbyings kyi klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rje su 'brang bar byed cing bla na med pa yang
177a5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can thams cad yongasasu smin par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba sku'i sgo re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la byang chub
177a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon nas/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyi klas pa thams cad rgyas par
177a7(phal chen): bkang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mang po brjod par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
177a8(phal chen): las ba spu'i sgo re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon te/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings kyi
177b1(phal chen): klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams du/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba'i
177b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi
177b3(phal chen): zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rnam par dag bla'i phyir/ byang chub
177b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par brjod pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re nas kyang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzog
177b5(phal chen): par bya ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sprin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'byung bas bka' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/
177b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par mthon nas/ mngon par 'bab pa mthong ngo / de de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo thams cad
177b7(phal chen): las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
177b8(phal chen): du yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed mngon par mthon pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon
178a1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul de lta bu mthong nas/ dga' rangs de mgu zhing nyam bde la tshim zhing yid
178a2(phal chen): bde ba skyes nas/ de bas kyang shas cher byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus sems sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i yan lag re re dang /
178a3(phal chen): yan lag rnam par phye ba re re dang lus kyi cha re re dang / lus kyi cha rnam par phye ba re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs re re dang / yan lag gi phyogs rnam par phye ba re re dang / lus
178a4(phal chen): re re dang / lus rnam par phye ba re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga rnam par phye ba re re nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rlung gi phung po dang
178a5(phal chen): bcas/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas/ gling dang bcas/ chu klung dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas ri rab dang
178a6(phal chen): bcas 'khor yug dang bcas grong dang grong khyer dang / ldod dang yul dang khams dang rgyal po'i gnas dang bcas nags tshal dang bcas/ khang khyim dang bcas/ skye bo'i tshogs
178a7(phal chen): dang bcas/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ byol song gi skye nas dang bcas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang bcas/ klu'i
178a8(phal chen): 'jig rten dang bcas/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten dang bcas/ mi'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas/ 'dod pa'i khams
178b1(phal chen): gyi yul dang bcas/ gzugs kyi khams kyi yul dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul dang bus/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas dbyibs dang bcas/ sprin dang
178b2(phal chen): bcas/ glog dang bcas/ skar ma dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ zla ba phyed dang bcas/ zla ba gcig dang bcas/ dus dang bcas/ lo dang bcas/ bskal pa bar ma dang bca
178b3(phal chen): bskal par bcas pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten thams kyang mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs
178b4(phal chen): la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nab phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
178b5(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng kun gyi phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
178b6(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas par/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to// des mi 'dzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
178b7(phal chen): nas cig tu rgyud pa'i ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i mi chen po'i mtshan re re las/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bcas/ byang chub sems
178b8(phal chen): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ sems can dang bcas khang khyim dang bcas/ nyin zhag dang bcas/ bskal pa dang bcas par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du phye ma'i
179a1(phal chen): mtha'i mur thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sngon gyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i
179a2(phal chen): mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon gyi mtha' dang /
179a3(phal chen): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang / mi chen po'i mtshan re re dang /
179a4(phal chen): spu'i bu ga re re nas shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun ma 'dres par mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po yang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
179a5(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar na/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can la 'dug cing / rnam par rtse ba 'di lta bu yongasu ston par mthong ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs na yang
179a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi pad+mo'i dpal gyi khams pad+mo'i dpal na rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongasu ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // shar
179a7(phal chen): phyogs na ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dang
179a8(phal chen): kun tu bzang po/ seng ge'i khri'i rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongasu ston pa mthong ngo // ji ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham
179b1(phal chen): cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na/ seng ge'i khri rin po che pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba 'di nyid yongasu ston par 'thong ba/ de bzhin
179b2(phal chen): du phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ rdul shin du phra ba re re'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba dag
179b3(phal chen): nang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drang na/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo chen po'i snying po can la 'dug cing rnam par rtse ba
179b4(phal chen): 'di nyid yongasu ston pa mthong ngo // de'i lus re re las kyang dus gsum du byung ba'i dmigs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon par bstan pa
179b5(phal chen): mthong ngo // zhing thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang / gzugs
179b6(phal chen): brnyan gyi tshul du rnam par dmigs par mngon du bstan pa mthong ngo // sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
179b7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / gdam ngags yongasu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsdu ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
179b8(phal chen): rnam par rol pa dag kyang thos par gyur to// des de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par rtsa ba de lta bu'i ngag mthong ste/ thos nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
180a1(phal chen): @spyod pa rnam pa bcu thob par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus kyi rgyas par bkang 'i
180a2(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'gro ba la tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par
180a3(phal chen): spyod pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim 'gro bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu byin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa
180a4(phal chen): thams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re las kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu zhum pa rab tu blangs pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob pa/
180a5(phal chen): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges par rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi rnam
180a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur
180a7(phal chen): thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis rlabs te/ chos kyi tshig gcig shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// chos rgya mtsho thams cad
180a8(phal chen): mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
180b1(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// sems can thams cad 'du shes kyi rnam par yongasasu bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// skad
180b2(phal chen): gcig gcig la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mngon sum du rab tu shes pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa thob par gyur to// de ltar ye
180b3(phal chen): shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i lag pa g.yas pa rkyang ste
180b4(phal chen): bzhag par gyur to// de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i/ lag pa bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la des ting nge 'dzin gyi
180b5(phal chen): sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la zhags par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra
180b6(phal chen): ba rnyed snga na bcad ma mthong ba dag la'ang zhugs par gyur to// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdal shin tu phra ba snyed kyang tshog su gyur to// de'i tham
180b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang rab tu byung bar gyur to// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gnas par bya ba
180b8(phal chen): chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur to// smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
181a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed la'ang zhugs par gyur to// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba'i lam sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kyang byung
181a2(phal chen): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shug
181a3(phal chen): drag po'i/ sang+yas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
181a4(phal chen): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to// ji ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po/ bcom ldan 'ad
181a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pa rkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor bzhag pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
181a6(phal chen): khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'dug byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzangs po'i kyang lag pa g.yos pa brkyang zhing tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
181a7(phal chen): kyi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to// de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba'i khongasu chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
181a8(phal chen): dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i kyang lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor/
181b1(phal chen): bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag par gyur to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag pas
181b2(phal chen): reg ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzad kyi chos kyi sgo mang po la zhugs par gyur de bzhin du kun bzang po'i lus thams cad las 'phros pa'i sprin mang po reg pa'i tshong
181b3(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyang chos kyi sgo mang po la tshul sna tshogs kyi zhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/
181b4(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong mod/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ni mthong na/ de tsam du rnam pa
181b5(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen na mkhyen grang ngo // des smras pa rigs kyi bu ngas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mngon par 'dod cing //
181b6(phal chen): bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu rnam par spyad de/ bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang byang chub kyi sems yongasu
181b7(phal chen): sbyong ba byed cing / ngas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to// bskal pa chen po de dag re
181b8(phal chen): re re la yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bsod nams yong su sdud cing mchod sbyin chen po gtong ba thams cad dang sbar ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par grags pa/ sen
182a1(phal chen): can thams cad la bstabs pa dag kyang mchod sbyin du byaso// bskal pa chen po de dag re re la yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la mngon par smon cing
182a2(phal chen): btang ba dang / gtang ba chen po dang / shin tu gtang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig byaso// bskal pa chen po de de dag re re
182a3(phal chen): la yang lus dang srog 'phangs par bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gces par bya bas lus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig yongasu gtang ngo // rgyal po'i srid chen
182a4(phal chen): po yang yongasu gtang ngo // grong dang grong grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang / khams dang rgyal po'i gnas dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // sdug cing yid du 'ong la gtang mi bro ba'i
182a5(phal chen): 'khor gyi tshogs dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // rang gi lus dang sha dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // bdag gi lus las khrag dag
182a6(phal chen): kyang slong ba rnams la yongasu gtang ngo // rus pa dang rkang dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // rkang pa dang lag pa dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // yan lag dang nyin lag dag kyang yongasu
182a7(phal chen): gtang ngo // sna dang rna ba dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // mig dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // rang gi kha nas lce'i dbang po dag kyang yongasu gtang ngo // bskal pa chen po de dag re re la
182a8(phal chen): yang // 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing / bla na med par gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bu la mngon par smon cing / rang gi mgo sas rgyas kyi zhing brjod
182b1(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig yongasu gtang ngo // bskal pa chen po re re la ci lta ba de bzhin du/ bskal pa chen po rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
182b2(phal chen): du med pa'i yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las/ bskal pa rgya mtsho re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
182b3(phal chen): cig la dbang po dam par gyur te/ rim 'gror byaso// bkur stir byaso// phu dud byaso/ mchod pa byaso// na bza' dang bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyan gyi skyen sman dang / yo byad
182b4(phal chen): dag kyang dbul ba byaso// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bstan pa la yang nga rab tu byung ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdam ngag thams cad la'ang rab tu zhug so// de dag gi
182b5(phal chen): bstan pa yongasu bzung ste/ rigs kyi bu de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan pa la yang sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang / mi mthun pa'i sems
182b6(phal chen): bskyed du mi dran no// de snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyis kyang / khong khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang / bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems sam/ bdag
182b7(phal chen): yongasu bskyang zhing yongasu bzung ba'i sems sam/ bdag dang gzhan du dbye ba'i sems sam/ byang chub kyi lam dang 'bral bar bya ba'i sems sam/ 'khor ba na gnas pas
182b8(phal chen): yongasu skyo ba'i sems sam/ zhum pa'i sems sam/ sgrib pas mgo rmongs pa'i sems bskyed du mi dran te/ gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs bsag pa'i phyir/
183a1(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems ye shes gzhan gyi mi thub cing rgal bar dka' ba'i snying po dang ldan par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste nga'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum chog
183a2(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas pa'i sbyor bdag dang / ngas snying rje chen po'i sems rab tu thob ste/ sems can yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu smin par bya ba dang /
183a3(phal chen): yongasu sbyang ba byas pa'i sbyor ba dag dang / sangs rgyas mchod cing bstan bkur ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu btsal ba'i don du/ bla ma la rim 'gror byas pa'i sbyor ba
183a4(phal chen): dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i lus yongasu btang btang ba'i sbyor ba dag dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu bsrung ba'i don du rang gi srog yongasu gtang ba'i sbyor de dag ni
183a5(phal chen): stan par byas na/ bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi bar du bstan kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ngas ni chos rgya mtsho de snyed cig las kyang tshig dang yi ge 'ga' tsam yang
183a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la yongasasu skyab pa la brtson pa dang rang gi sems kyi rgyud nges par shes par bya ba la rtson pa dang / pha rol gyis chos sngon du thos par bya ba la brtson pa dang /
183a7(phal chen): 'jig rten pa'i ye shes snang ba thams cad rab tu brjod pa la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thams cad brjod pa la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad
183a8(phal chen): 'khor ba'i bde ba yongasu bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa la brtson pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yod
183b1(phal chen): su bas mnyos pa 'am/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bas ma nyos pa gang yang med de/ de ltar nga nyid kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya na/ bskal pa
183b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed zad par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas rnam pa de lta bu'i tshogs stobs dang / dge
183b3(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu bsags pa'i stobs dang / mos pa rgya chen po'i stobs dang / yon tan la nan du bya ba'i stobs dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud
183b4(phal chen): par bya ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi mig gi stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs
183b5(phal chen): dang / shin tu sbyang ba'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzungs pa'i stobs kyis/ chos kyi las yongasu dag pa/ dus gsum du tha mi
183b6(phal chen): dad pa thob par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gzugs kyi lus 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu/ rnam par dmig
183b7(phal chen): pa mtshan thams cad dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ zhing rgya mtsho re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa'i sprin
183b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
184a1(phal chen): chub tu sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gdam ngag dang / rjesu bstan
184a2(phal chen): pas rje su bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi khongasu gtogs pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/ sems can yongasu smin par
184a3(phal chen): byed par gyur to// de ltar tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ dge ba'i shes gnyen sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig gi drung du byin te/ mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur
184a4(phal chen): bas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags par gyur pa de'i brgya'i
184a5(phal chen): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang ma yin/ brgya stong gi char yang ma yin/ bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang ma yin te/ grang dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dper bya ba dang /
184a6(phal chen): rgyur bya ba rtsam du yang mi phod do// des dang po sems bskyed pa nye bar bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong ba'i bar der sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gcig
184a7(phal chen): nas gcig tu rgyud pa ci snyed gcig la zhugs par gyur pa de dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'gyur du/ byang chub
184a8(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ba spu'i bu ga re rer sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa mang po la sems kyi skad cig gcig gis zhugs par gyur te/ ba spu'i/
184b1(phal chen): bu ga re rer ji lta ba bzhin du/ ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa thams cad la yang sems kyi skad cig re re la/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
184b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par gnon pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pas zhugs kyang / zhing rgya
184b3(phal chen): mtsho gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i mthar phyin par ma gyur te/ zhing rgya mtsho'i lhan dang zhing rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / zhing rgya mtsho'i yongasu sdu ba dang / zhing rgya mtsho'i yongs su
184b4(phal chen): 'grub pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho'i 'jig pa dang / zhing rgya mtsho'i rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya
184b5(phal chen): mtsho'i sku dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i yongasu bsdu ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya mtsho yongasu 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgya mtsho
184b6(phal chen): 'jig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gcig nas gcig rgyud pa dang / byang
184b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i bye brag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
184b8(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho yongasu bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongasu 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
185a1(phal chen): 'jig pa dang / sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa dang / skad cig re res sems can gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po
185a2(phal chen): shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya zhing 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang / byang chub
185a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa yongasu gnan pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgya mtsho mthar yang byin par ma gyur te/ de zhing la lar ni bskal par rnam par spyad par gyur to// zhing la lar ni bskal
185a4(phal chen): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du spyod par gyur te/ zhing de dag nas kyang g.yos pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang / zhing rgya
185a5(phal chen): mtsho mtha' dpung med pa la 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smin par byed par gyur te/ des de ltar mthar gyis byang chub
185a6(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dag smon lam mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing tham
185a7(phal chen): cad lus kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / spyod pa yongasu rdzogs pa rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya ba'i rnam par 'phral pa yongasu
185a8(phal chen): bstan pas rgyas par bkang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
185b1(phal chen): dbyangs brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / stobs dang mi 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyin
185b2(phal chen): par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par
185b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rjesu thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i/ bskal ba dang bskal pa 'byam klas pa dang /
185b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa de dag brnan te/ mngon par
185b5(phal chen): brjod pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyi smon lam btab pa// ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge kun/
185b6(phal chen): bdag gi ma lus de dag thams cad la/ lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gi/ rgyal ba thams cad yid kyi mngon sum du//
185b7(phal chen): zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/ rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshalo// rdul cig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na zhugs pa
185b8(phal chen): dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par/ thams cad rgyal ba dag gis myos/ de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgra kun
186a1(phal chen): gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnam
186a2(phal chen): dang byug pa'i gdugs mchog dang / mar me mchog dang gdug pa'i dam pa'i/ rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ nam bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang / phye ma'i phur
186a3(phal chen): ma'i ri rab mnyam pa dang / khyed par can gyi rgyan mchog thams cad kyis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyis// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba tham
186a4(phal chen): cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis/ rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par gyis/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni// lus dang ngag
186a5(phal chen): dang de bzhin yid kyi kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ de dag thams cad bdag gi so sor gshegs/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// /
186a6(phal chen): rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjesu bdag yid rang // gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnam/
186a7(phal chen): byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags bsnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor ba bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la/
186a8(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / bdag gi thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing gsheg
186b1(phal chen): ba dang / rjesu yid rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag ci bsags pa/ de dag thams cad byang chub phyir sngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang
186b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu yi/ 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par 'gyur/ gang yang de dag rab myur bar/ bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas byon/ phyogs bcu ga le'i zhing
186b3(phal chen): rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya chen yongasu dag par 'gyur/ byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / sangs rgyas sras kyi rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems
186b4(phal chen): can gang nams ji snyed pa/ de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar shog/ 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni/ 'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa
186b5(phal chen): dag ni dag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun du skye ba dran par shog/ tshe rab kun tu 'chi 'pho ston pa na/ rtag tu bdag ni rab tu byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjesu slob gyur te//
186b6(phal chen): bzang po spyod pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ rtag tu mnyam sa skyon med spyod par shog/ lha'i skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad//
186b7(phal chen): grul bum dag dang mi'i skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ci tsam par/ thams cad skad du bdag gi chos bstan to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson to//
186b8(phal chen): byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag/ de dag ma lus yongasu byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams
187a1(phal chen): las/ grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnamasu yang / ji ltar pad+mo'i chus mi chags pa bzhin/ nyi bla na mkha' thogs pa med ltar spyod/ zhing gi khyon
187a2(phal chen): dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed/ bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun bkod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyod// byang chub spyod pa
187a3(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs byed cing // sems can dgra ni spyod dang mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur/ bdag gi spyod
187a4(phal chen): dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa/ de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam cig tu sbyad/ bdag
187a5(phal chen): la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po gang / bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gi nams kyang yid mi byung / sangs
187a6(phal chen): sras kyi bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ mngon sum rtag tu bdag gi rgyal ba lta/ ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba
187a7(phal chen): rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing / byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/ bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyang ba yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par bgyis/ srid
187a8(phal chen): pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na/ bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnams thar yang / yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/
187b1(phal chen): rdul cig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams ste/ zhing der bsam gyi mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la/ byang chub spyad pa spyod cing lta
187b2(phal chen): bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogasu yang // skra tsam khyod la dus gsum tshad snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho spyod
187b3(phal chen): cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung cig yan lag rgya mtsho sgra skad kyi/ rgyal ba kun yang yan lag rnams dag pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas
187b4(phal chen): gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsungs dbyangs
187b5(phal chen): mi zad la// blo'i stobs kyi bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang / skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ gang yang
187b6(phal chen): bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyi ni zhugs par spyod/ dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis lta// /
187b7(phal chen): rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum bdag gi zhing gi rgyan/ de dag rdul cig steng du mngon par
187b8(phal chen): bsgrub/ de dag ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ de dag rim par 'tshang rgyas
188a1(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor/ mya nang 'das pa rab tu ni mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stog/
188a2(phal chen): rnams dang / kun nas sgo ba'i theg pa'i stobs dag dang / kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang / kun tu khyab par byams pa bdag gi stobs/ kun tu dge
188a3(phal chen): ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang / chags pa med pa gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ byang chub stobs rnams yang
188a4(phal chen): dag bsgrub par byed/ las kyi stobs rnams yongasu dag byed cing / nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab
188a5(phal chen): byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par gyi/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // sems can rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par grol/ chos rnams
188a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing // ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed
188a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing // bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyod par byed/ gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi/ byang chub spyod pa'i smon
188a8(phal chen): lam bye brag rnams/ bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas rnam/ de kun ma lus bdagi rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi mthu'o pa//
188b1(phal chen): gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang tshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu sngo'o// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag
188b2(phal chen): cing // spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yong dag dang // bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra dag kyang de dag dang mtshungs par shog/
188b3(phal chen): kun nas dge ba bzang po spyod pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyod par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de'i bya ba ma lus rdzogs
188b4(phal chen): par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // de dag sprul
188b5(phal chen): pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi// nam mkha'i thar thug gyur pa ci tsam pa// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar
188b6(phal chen): gyur pa// bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen rgyan de rgyal ba rnams la phul/
188b7(phal chen): lha dang mi'i bde ba mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskal pa phul ba bas// gang gi bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi
188b8(phal chen): rjesu rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pa ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gi bzang spyod smon lam 'di
189a1(phal chen): btab pas// de ni ngan song thams cad spangs par gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spong ba yin// snang
189a2(phal chen): ba mtha' yas de yang de myur mthong // de dag snyed par rab snyed bde bar mtsho// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag leg par 'ong // kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra
189a3(phal chen): bar// de dag ring bar mi thog de 'drar 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po bdag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gi byas pa dag/ de yis
189a4(phal chen): bzang po ba spyod pa 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongasu byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams
189a5(phal chen): dang ldan par ldan// bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de
189a6(phal chen): myur shog/ song nas sems can ban phyir der 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad
189a7(phal chen): btul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang dang ni ston pa'am klog pa yi// de'i rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog
189a8(phal chen): som nyid ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gi ni rjesu bdag slob
189b1(phal chen): cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu sngags pa
189b2(phal chen): des// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu sngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams
189b3(phal chen): cad bdag ni phyir bsal te// mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyis zhing der rab tu 'gro// der song nas ni smon lam 'di
189b4(phal chen): dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yongasu bskang // 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan
189b5(phal chen): par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes// snang ba mtha'
189b6(phal chen): yas rgyal ba'i mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gi der thob shog/ der ni bdag gi lung bstan rab thob nas/
189b7(phal chen): sprul pa mang po bye ba brag rgya yis// blo'i stobs kyi phyogs bcu rnams su yang // sems can rnams la p+pa mang po bgyi// shin
190a1(phal chen): tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas
